dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Electric-neon netherworld. Pulsing chromatics over jet bl CONSTRUCTION CREW toils to complete a vast SWITCHING NEXU CYPER-TECH CREWMEN and MACHINERY branded "X-NET" 3D lattice of routers, refractors, reassemblers... New, unused data OPTIK HIGHWAY routes radiate from all sides, crossing cyberspace. X-Net Tactical Corps troops (herein X-Takks) patrol every inch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DATA "TRAIN" enters. Sliver of RED DATA ENERGY shunt off, shooting into RANDOM MEMORY BUFFER - geometrically perfec lattice of PLASMA BEAMS and WHITE HOT intersection points X-Takks notice, moving to investigate.

dialogues.speaker: DEEP IN THE LATTICE
dialogues.text: Red data "uploads" into solid form. A RED FIGURE. We see from the back - infrared strobing DISK, etched metallic detail, lethal EDGES - Then slowly he - IT - turns. Hardly a face, only data-hun eyes, riveted to a TASK - TRON 2.0. Seriously upgraded, over-clocked, armed for trouble. The friendly hero we once knew has been re-programmed into a ruthless cyber-ninja. X-Takks search ten story gantries. TRON springs into the lattice, dodging PLASMA BEAMS, avoi detection. Slips into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Takks on high alert. TRON slips down main shaft, freezes, confirms data. Darts behind MAIN POWER SUPPLY. Pulls his DISK. DISK opens, extends oscillating DATA KEY. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 2

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: TRON inserts key in and ENCRYPTION PANEL. Circuits energi Shockwave quakes system. POWER SUPPLY OVERLOADS, SHORTING OUT. X-Takks spot TRON.

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKKS
dialogues.text: Intruder! Fix coordinates! POLICE POUNCE, FIRING. Tron pulls hyper-disk off his back and HURLS IT - DISK strikes cop, fries his circuits. Disk ricochets, brutally accurate, takes out three more Police - TRON flips into the air - His DISK boomerangs straight fo him. Certain death. But his timing is inhumanly accurate. DISK docks on his back midair, lands and bolts.

dialogues.speaker: ALARMS WAIL -
dialogues.text: POWER SUPPLY VERGES on MELTDOWN, CIRCUITS FRY, PLASMA SPE X-NET CRISIS TEAM rushes in, inserts MASTER KEY. POWER SU STABILIZES. Catastrophe averted. TRON flips away, chased by firing X-Takks - Arriving on the scene - split-second response: Elite team of X-NET SECURITY AGENTS, lead by: RX23 SECURITY LEADER (Cyber-twin of our real-world hero R TRON jumps down MAIN SHAFT - a thousand stories. Riding h DISK as a heat shield dodges X-Net fire, swerves into a D

dialogues.speaker: CHANNEL -
dialogues.text: RX23 and a pair of his AGENTS hop on PULSE RIDER vehicles hotly pursuing TRON. TRON PLUNGES onto a DATA HIGHWAY - speed out of NEXUS, hu across cyberspace.

dialogues.speaker: AGENT 1
dialogues.text: This is the first time an Intruder has broken into X-Net!

dialogues.speaker: RX23 LEADER
dialogues.text: And it's the last. Follow him! Shut him down! They speed onto the OPTIK HIGHWAY.  TRON 2.0 Jefferies 3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Broadband, light-speed OPTIK HIGHWAY. Empty, except for TRON - accelerating, escaping. Rx23 and AGENTS catch up fast on Pulse Rider Vehicles. TRON throws his disk. Blings off Agents - triggers CRASH. PLASMA BLAST rips open highway wall. Rx23 emerges unscathed, pursuing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON leaps out blast hole, recovers his disk, vanishes in ANCIENT SYSTEM ZONE. Rx23 roars after him, riding hard, joined by: Airborne SEARCH ENGINE vehicle, piloted by a dumpy nerd program called KROD.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I got a lock. Coordinate 32937!

dialogues.speaker: RX23
dialogues.text: I'm on him! RX23 chases Tron into a dark canyon. Hairpin turns and bl curves. RX23 arrives a junction. Tron has vanished.

dialogues.speaker: RX23
dialogues.text: Which way did he go?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rabbit warren of computer programmers in crisis mode. A head shoots up from a cubicle. It's Rush Nortebi, 23, computer security expert. Real world version of the RX23 program. His cubicle is jammed with racks of vintage and bleeding-edge computer gear

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I said WHICH WAY DID HE GO? Dozens of programmers work feverishly to track the system intruder. Everybody's stumped. Dangling from desk lamps the company toy: Conical pyramid with a square stuck on t labeled "X-NET RULES!" (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 4

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Come on guys! Nobody hacks X-Net You gonna let him get away?!

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Rush, I think I found him! In the adjacent cubicle: Overweight ultra-nerd MILES RABB real world version of cyberworld Krod.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Check the old game grid! Rush jockeys an old Apple LISA computer. On screen: a cru old vector graphics game grid. A RED FIGURE steps appears the grid.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You get a cookie, Miles! Programmers gather to watch Rush in action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vast, low-rez, uncool, largely forgotten. TRON pulls a LIGHT WAND from his legging, grips it. A TUR CHARGED LIGHT-CYCLE rezzes up beneath him. He fires his LIGHTCYCLE. ZIP, he's gone. Onto the grid blasts RX23, speeding on his Pulse rider. H skids and swerves, learning the funky surface. Search Engine flies onto the scene, hovering overhead.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Coordinate 6532.02! There he goes! The chase is on. TRON escapes across the vast grid-plane, head down, eyes hollow. He gains speed, retreating to somewhere... RX23 surges on his Pulse Rider, closing the gap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush gets the hang of this old game.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I haven't played this since I was 4. But I was mighty awesome. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 10 11 TRON 2.0 Jefferies

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: RED LIGHTCYCLE turns hard 90 degrees, Rush maneuvers to counter. Co-workers lean over the cubicle walls from all sides:

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Score an ID on this leech?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Negative. He's nobody.

dialogues.speaker: KELTER
dialogues.text: Rush, you've gotta nail him.

dialogues.speaker: PHLEGMAN
dialogues.text: Or you know we're all fired. Rush baits the RED LIGHTCYCLE. It anticipates his every move, goading him, tailing him.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Whoa, Rush! I groked a pattern in his moves! Fake left, go right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Search Engine flies overhead - Krod locks on Tron. RX23's Pulse Rider pulls the move, surges up beside red lightcycle. Tron pulls away, baiting his opponent.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: You got him on the run, dude!

dialogues.speaker: OTHERS
dialogues.text: Crash him! Rush RUSH RUSH. RUSH hits keys, jockeys mouse. Feeling good. Shifts drive status to: "TURBOJECT".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RX23's Pulse Rider SCREAMS, gaining on Tron. Neck-and-nec But Tron suddenly brakes, quitting the chase. RX23 is puzzled. Looks forward. Eyes spring wide.  12 13 14 15 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush's screen: His Pulse Rider speeds straight for the ro

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yikes!

dialogues.speaker: CYBERSPACE
dialogues.text: Pulse Rider smashes into rocks, RX23 pulverizes to neon b Electro SHOCKWAVE sears across game grid. Search Engine freezes overhead, glitches and CRASHES like a blimp. All goes white - snow crash.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: He crashed me!

dialogues.speaker: NERDS
dialogues.text: FUBAR! Bad Thing! Flame war!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Miles. Did you get a trace on him?! Miles stares at his blank screen. Blinking. Every screen in the lab is blank.

dialogues.speaker: PHLEGMAN
dialogues.text: We are so screwed.

dialogues.speaker: KELTER
dialogues.text: Who tells the boss? All eyes land on Rush.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Get the system back up! Now! Move!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PRESS CREWS camp a block away. X-Net PR TEAM preps a media extravaganza. Shirt logo: "X- NET = TOTAL DATA SECURITY" Banners, video projections, mu X-NET PUBLIC RELATIONS VP leads entourage on a preview. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 15 TRON 2.0 Jefferies

dialogues.speaker: PR VP
dialogues.text: Weather is holding. Dress rehearsal on for 6PM. In the morning, we let the press in for a 7AM tech set-up, then you go live worldwide 9 AM sharp. Staff defers to: GORDON SINCLAIR (45), boyish, ruthless, brilliant CEO of Encom Corporation.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Delay the press until 8:30. I'll taking the stage at 8:50. Forcea network break-in. Then it's news. He catches something on a video screen, snaps his fingers

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Play that again. Crew murmurs on headsets. Promo video replays:

dialogues.speaker: VIDEO PLAYBACK
dialogues.text: X-Net deploys radical software design constructs proprietary white-hot firewalls, unleashes virus killer apps. Creating the most secure data network in history. Your data can never again be hacked, corrupted stolen or destroyed. X-Net is the final solution, totally guaranteed 99.999% secure data transmission -

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Who changed that? Who put "99.999"? X-Net executives chill.

dialogues.speaker: PR VP
dialogues.text: Um, that would be... Legal. Eyes land on withering LEGAL VP.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Change it back to the way I wrote it. With the launch of X-Net, this company guarantees one hundred percent secure data transmission. If we can't deliver on that promise, we deserve to be out of business. Rush appears from a building. Signals Sinclair aside.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: What can't wait, Rush? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 15 16 17 18 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 8

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Um. X-Net was just breached by a hacker. SINCLAIR goes pale.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: System's back up, no permanent damage, but... But whoever's behind this they're good, and they're still out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sprawling, big bucks, basketball hoop. Sinclair enters, alone. Closes door. Uses a retinal scan ID to access his computer. Secure connection opens. As he speaks, text instantly appears:

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Identify the intruder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flashing circuitry, machine code bit-storm. We follow Sinclair's text message data stream Min-blowing cyberspace fly-over. DATA BEAM penetrates a towering shaft, reaching deep insi the MASSIVELY FORTIFIED X-NET CENTRAL SERVER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LONE FIGURE stands clothed in flashy cyber-armor: Fluid photons, oozing high-rez circuitry. It's PLEXOR, cyber-twin of real-world Sinclair. He crosses into an round inner sanctum. DATA STREAM radia from above. PLEXOR stands in the center, pulls his DISK off his back, raises it above his head. Data stream converges onto disk, becomes a tight RUBY RED COMMUNICATION BEAM. Plexor's eyes decode transmission. Text races across his eyes: IDENTIFY THE INTRUDER. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 18 19 20 21 22 23 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 9

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Identity not captured.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other side of the link. Real-world Sinclair reads text as it appear on his office screen: IDENTITY NOT CAPTURED.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: How did he enter X-Net? His text inputs. Answer comes: "Path untraceable"

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: How could you let this happen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor processes the input - remains emotionless.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: I do what you programmed me to do. I am constructing X-Net

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: New instructions - find and destroy the intruder! Text reply: "Resource allocation reconfiguration required Estimated delay to X-Net construction: 46.4 hours."

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: No. We can't delay the opening of X- Net. Disregard my last command. Maintain construction priority. Sinclair cuts off the contact, pressure mounting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruby beam goes dark. Plexor lowers his disk. His eyes are cold, his confidence supreme.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crisis management team assembles. Nervous X-Net Senior St (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 23 TRON 2.0 Jefferies

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: 10 Rush arrives late, out of breath, determined. Joins Phleg and Kelter.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: System is stable again, keep you fingers crossed.

dialogues.speaker: PHLEGMAN
dialogues.text: Any luck finding the intruder?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Don't ask. RUSH notices across the room: Brilliant, beautiful MEGAN RANDALL, his age. Her security ID: "LEVEL BLACK"

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What's she doing here? This is an operations meeting.

dialogues.speaker: KELTER
dialogues.text: You and Meg still, eh... At it?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: There was never anything between us. Kelter and Phlegman trade a look. Sure.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: She's Advanced Projects. This has nothing to do with her. Sinclair storms in. Room falls silent.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: This company's existence depends on the flawless launch of X-Net in twenty- two hours, fifty-one minutes. Now somebody - some hacker, some competitor, somebody - just proved they're smarter than us. Breaking into X-Net is theoretically impossible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody looks at Rush.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: This creep's the best I've ever seen. He crosses platforms, cracks 128 bit encryption, cloaks every move, never leaves a trace.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: When you find him, I'll be sure to hire him. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 23 TRON 2.0 Jefferies

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 14 Chuckles around the room. Mood chills: Sinclair's not laughing.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Boys and girls, we cannot sell a secure network that is not secure.

dialogues.speaker: PR VP
dialogues.text: We delay the launch.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: And the world assumes we've got a faulty product. And they'd be right

dialogues.speaker: KELTER
dialogues.text: We ramp up our encryption schemes -

dialogues.speaker: PHLEGMAN
dialogues.text: Thicken all firewalls -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We can't win playing defense. And it's a bigger job than just swatting an intruder program. Somewhere, there's a human mind behind this thing. We have to get to that User and shut him - or her - down, or the game never ends. Meg listens quietly. Studies Rush.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: What do you need, Rush?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: 20 guys for 20 days -

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: We don't have 20 hours. This problem needs to be gone before tomorrow 9AM. Come on people, this company's future is at stake! It's time to think without a box! Minds ponder grimly. Finally, a lone VP rises. the company Archivist.

dialogues.speaker: RUDY
dialogues.text: At a time like this, let's seek inspiration in the past. We should ask ourselves: What solution would spring from the inspired mind of our departed leader, Flynn. It's RUDY, (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 23 24 25 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 12

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He's got an obituary photo of FLYNN, Encom's legendary previous - and deceased - CEO. Groans around the table. Execs rolls their eyes, disses Rudy's idea. Flynn has become a stale company joke. Rudy sheepishly sits. But Sinclair stops behind Rudy, eyes fixed on the photo o Flynn. An idea takes hold. He looks to Meg.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Is the QF-401 is operational?

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Um... Midway into phase one testing. Confusion among execs. Nobody knows what a "QF-401" is. Not even Rush.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: If we can't fight this intruder from the outside, then maybe we need to fight him from the inside. Meg's mind races.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: I'm ready to do my part.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: This company needs a hero. Who among you is the smartest, most resourceful and courageous? Looks trade around the table. Meg slowly rises, indicatin her choice.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Who else could it be? She's singled out Rush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meg leads Sinclair and Rush to a SECURE ELEVATOR. Her ret scan ID opens the door. They step in.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Somebody going to tell me what I've been volunteered for? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 25 26 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 13

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Rush, you're the only one I can trust to eliminate the intruder. But you won't be doing it the way you thought. Meg's been working on something down here that's, well... Beyond Top Secret. Rush drills a look at Meg, but she keeps it all business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out the elevator, Meg leads them into a maze of ultra-tec gear.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: This is where Flynn worked. And where he died. Amid sleek new equipment, there's a glass cabinet housing CHARRED REMNANT of strange machinery.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Meg has reconstructed Flynn's last project. This time it works. Mega signals lab assistant DEWEY. He pokes buttons: A MASSIVE TECHNICAL DEVICE unfolds and boots up.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You didn't pick this up at Circuit City. What is it?

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: A Quantum Digitizer. Prototype, only one of its kind. Flynn designed it to break down physical objects into high resolution data. Luckily, we salvaged his key components and back-engineered the system. She opens a cage, places her LAB RAT (Jo-Jo) on a target stage. Dewey boots controls, presses commands. Beam array scans the rat into the computer, forming a 3D rat-image o screens, dematerializing the physical rat. Device revs do Rush runs his hand over the empty target stage.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: That's... Not possible. Lab rat has vanished from the physical world. Its digitiz image rotates on monitors. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 14

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Flynn was trying to take it one step further. He wanted to transport a human being into cyberspace.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You mean the urban legends? A computer sucked Flynn into cyberspace a long time ago.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: We think it happened. Meg agrees. Rush gets a chill.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: It was a fluke. But Flynn worked for years, down here, trying to make it happen again. One day a test went bad. A plasma reaction destroyed this lab. Flynn was reduced to ash. Rush views the charred remains in the glass case. Photos the destroyed lab. Spooky evidence of a hellish death sce

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I was never told how he died. It was all just weird, you know, because Flynn's the guy who hired me. But he was strange, kept to himself, I didn't know what job I was supposed to be doing. (to Sinclair) Then you came onboard, the company woke up, we had a direction. It was kind of pathetic, because by the time Flynn died, everybody was too busy to care.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: He was brilliant in his way, but genius without discipline leads to nothing. His reckless habits nearly ruined this company... And for sure got him killed. A last look at the charred remains of Flynn's machine.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: That kind of accident can't happen again. We've upgraded the system in ways Flynn never could. The chips didn't exist until now. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 26 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: She presses commands. Beams re-materialize the lab rat on the target stage. Jo-jo is as good as new.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Hey, Jo-Jo. Have good trip? She puts the rat in on her shoulder, feeds it a tidbit. Then she scrutinizes Rush. Rush considers Meg, then turns to Sinclair

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You want her to send me into cyberspace to catch that jerk who hacked us?

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: The future of this company depends on it. Rush looks to Meg. She offers a reassuring nod.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You can bring me back okay?

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Ask Jo-Jo. Lab rat is perched happily on her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Destroy the intruder by 9AM tomorrow, Rush. I know if anyone can, it's you. I've had my eye on you for a long time. Score this hit and I'll make you my full partner in this company. Rush is awe-struck. Ready, willing, able. He shakes Sinclair's hand, sealing the deal.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I won't let you down. Let's do it. Meg removes target stage, swings a custom TARGET CHAIR in place. Rush lowers in place. Meg buckles him in. Last chance for a private word:

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: I promise I'll get you back safely by 9AM tomorrow. But you have to promise me something too - (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 16

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You're a piece of work. You dumped me because you said I was too much about the company's needs and not enough about yours. Well here we are, the company needs their best guy, and you just can't admit how much to hurts to nominate me.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: This bigger than us, Rush. Listen to me. I don't know what you're going to find in there, but whatever it is, promise you'll follow your heart and do the right thing. Rush stares at here, in shock

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Oh. So you think I have a heart? Meg breaks away, retreating to the controls with Sinclair Rush's trails her with his eyes - he can't stop looking.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: (under his breath) I promise. Meg initiates Quantum Digitizer sequence. Rush watches PULSING CHROMATIC LIGHT build down the unit' column, coming toward him. Plasma strobes CYAN/MAGENTA. Unit HUMS... Then GROANS WILDLY. Flashes randomize. Something's off balance - Meg worries. Moves for the "abort" button.

dialogues.speaker: DEWEY
dialogues.text: It's overloading! Unit sparks. Ceramic components STRESS and CRACK. Rush clenches his seat, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What's happening?!

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: System is losing stability! Sinclair sees: Monitor sounds company-wide alert: "X-NET

dialogues.speaker: BREECH
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 26 27 28 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 17

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: There's been another breech!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's the Intruder again!

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: We have to abort!

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: We might not get another chance!

dialogues.speaker: DO IT
dialogues.text: Sinclair pulls Meg's hand from the "abort" button and sla his hand on "DIGITIZE" BEAM ARRAY scans Rush's body, reducing it to bits - Meg worries - Sinclair dives for cover - PLASMA BALL engulfs Quantum Digitizer FINAL BITS of Rush scan away. Plasma ball FRIES the unit. Breakers trip. Power fades. Meg and Sinclair come up to find: Quantum Digitizer: In a smoking heap. Target chair: Empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Light-speed thrill-ride, hurling into digital chaos. Rush's electrified body hurtles across the void, eyes fil with TERROR and AWE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shimmering bits morph into an awesome cyberscape. Rush enters this bizarre world - CRASH/FLASH - stranger i strange land. Data energy ZAPS off his body, interacting with the landscape circuitry around him. He fights it, tr to control it. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 28 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 18

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Rush stands, beholds the place. Looks at his hands and ar clad in circuitry. He finds he had landed outside: Fortress-like X-NET CENTRAL SERVER. ALARMS SOUNDING insid He turns, looks up a FIREWALL. Hundreds of X-Takk Troops hurry to look down. FIRING WEAPONS. A FIGURE comes at him, down the wall, STREAKING RED.

dialogues.speaker: BLAMMO
dialogues.text: TRON lands on a plateau above Rush, gazing down. They face each other, equally perplexed. Rush is no longer human, but not quite a program either. Energy zaps off his body, infusing the surrounding circui Tron stares, unblinking - Cyber-Ninja.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's YOU! The intruder! Rush's body circuits PULSE with anger - data surges out h feet, across floor circuitry, up to the plateau. Energy interacts with Tron's body circuits, siphoning off bits o code. Code races across Rush's eyes. Identification data.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You are... TRON?!? X-Takks hustle onto the scene. Tron leaps off the plateau, cutting the data connection. whips his disk off his back and THROWS. Disk SLAMS Rush in the gut, knocks him flat.

dialogues.speaker: ARRRGHH
dialogues.text: X-Takks pursue Tron - Tron recovers his disk - vanishes in an OUTBOUND DATA STR losing his pursuers. X-Takks pull Rush to his feet, shocked.

dialogues.speaker: RX23
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 28 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 19

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK 2
dialogues.text: But... You crashed irrecoverably!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Uh, well, I'm not exactly -

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK 3
dialogues.text: RX23 has been rebooted!

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: RX23 reboot was not authorized! Pushing through Police: A sleek, smart cyber-babe MEGA. (She's Meg's cyber-twin: Twice the edge, half the patienc all the curves.) Rush is awed by the sight of her.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yow. I know who programmed you.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I am Mega, X-Net Intelligence.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Mega. Cool. I am -

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: A spy? Posing as RX23? Under which register were you rebooted?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I'm a User. Mega and X-Takks look at him like he's crazy.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Detain this impostor. X-Takks move to seize Rush.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: No wait, look. We're on the same side here. I got an ID on the intruder! Mega touches Rush, exciting his energy flow. She reads data streaming in his eyes - TRON'S ID info.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: "Tron"?

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK 2
dialogues.text: How did he get that?? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 28 29 30 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 20

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Plexor must know of this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mega and X-Takks escort Rush across bridges, in security portals. Firewalls cool and part, allowing them to pass. Down a grand corridor, past towering energy columns and throbbing green memory banks. They cross a bridge. View includes: Vast square concentric security rings surround massive cubic POWER SUPPLY CORE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor toils over the latest security breech, failing to decipher recordings of the Intruder Rush is brought in buy Mega. He double-takes on Plexor, t cyber-twin of Sinclair

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Plexor. This is the one. Plexor steps closer, scanning Rush.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You are not RX23.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: My name is Rush. I'ma - Look, I got an ID on the Intruder. Do you know the program they used to call Tron? Plexor activates memory banks. Accesses archive files of the original low-rez Tron: So harmless, so many years ago Bears little resemblance to the upgraded Tron.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You are in error. Zero match.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Exactly. That's how he's getting past you. You don't see him for what he is. He's one of your own, gone bad. Tron was a crude security program from Encom's old days. Strictly low-rez, right? Archived and forgotten. But his source code contains all the architecture of every Encom system, including X-net. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 30 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 21

dialogues.speaker: RUSH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That's why some smart User dusted him off and upgraded him -

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: "User"?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: People. Like me. From the outside. People who write all of your instructions. Plexor and Mega trade a look.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: He displays random instability.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Users do not exist.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: How do we contact Sinclair? He'll explain.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Define "Sinclair".

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You don't know? Oh geez. There must be a way to link him into this. Rush touches Plexor's command console, but his energy OVERLOADS the system - X-Takks pull Rush away.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Zero match for a "Sinclair".

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: He's your boss. Everybody's boss. Outside, in the real world.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Assuming the existence of a world beyond this, is a fatal error

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Plexor issues all commands.

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKKS
dialogues.text: Grep grep. Rush considers his predicament. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 30 31 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 22

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Okay. Sorry. I'ma program, guess I got a piece of my code corrupted. Whatever it is, it's given me power over Tron. (to X-Takks and Mega) They saw me read his circuits. Can any other program do that? Plexor looks to Mega.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: He creates alternative data channels at will.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Chaos.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm a little unstable. But I can find Tron for you. Plexor processes. His eyes stream barcode data to X-Takks

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Release him. X-Takk Troops read Plexor's barcode command with their ey They let go of Rush. Plexor turns to Mega. Issues more barcode.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Interface with this one. Exploit his ability. Locate the program "Tron" and destroy him on sight.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Instructions received, Plexor Mega exits with Rush. Plexor's gaze lingers on Rush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Security PORTAL opens. Ultra sleek STRAITHE vehicle glides out, accesses a shiny new, EMPTY X-NET DATA OPTIK HIGHWAY.  32 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 23

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mega at the controls. Rush rides, beholding the lightshow wonder of Cyberspace.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I need to find a program called KROD. He's a specialist in pattern recognition. He snagged the last known position on Tron for me. Mega scans data, gets a fix on "KROD"

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: This is a waste of X-Net resources. You're strictly random. We will never find the intruder this way.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Plexor ordered us to work together You can't doubt his instructions right?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Of course not. But I am programmed to predict all possible errors. You contain an infinite quantity.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Meg for sure programmed you.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I have no data on "Meg".

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Never mind. I'm being random. Mega speeds along empty X-Net OPTIK HIGHWAY. Wide, secure newly constructed. High above the tangle of chaotic, clog OLD DATA ARTERIES.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: X-Net is amazing. It's going to change everything. Unless one rogue program called Tron brings it down. Do you believe he could?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I calculated the probability. (soberly) He could crash it all.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: So we're working together on this? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 32 33 34 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 24

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: As instructed, I will interface. Mega pulls STRAITHE into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Construction nearly complete. High security. Mega leads Rush to secured encryption gates. Her eyes lig with data, the gate opens.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: The program "KROD" is over there. Across a bridge: An old-network HUB CITY. Like Hong Kong in wilder days. Jammed with Programs, colorful data, loud data transfer screams.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What a dump. He heads across, but Mega hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hey. Interface. Mega grudgingly follows. Portal closes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Electro-pop overload. Rush and Mega squeeze through crowd past screaming data pipes and sizzling circuitry. City is dominated by mugshots of TRON: "ENEMY OF THE FUTU Mega locates a gleaming X-NET KIOSK. A PROMOTER (KROD) extoles the virtues of the X-Net system:

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Three more hub cities have been attacked by viruses! (crowd gets scared) But X-Net opens soon! You will travel in total security! Crowd buzzes. They can't wait

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: This is the one you seek? Rush approaches Krod. Looks like Miles Rabbish. There's a bizarre moment of recognition between them. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 25

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's gotta be -

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Krod!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Krod!

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Yeah, yeah - Heeey!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: The best pattern recognition program ever. (to Mega) This guy can filter a river of junk data and pull out the good stuff.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: You know it, dude! Krod smiles big at Mega, refers to Rush:

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Who is this guy? Rush pulls Krod aside.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Miles - I mean Krod, you flew the search engine. You ran a trace ona hotshot lightcycle rider. The red guy. Remember?

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Well. Eh. I'd like to help you but truth is, I just got rebooted from a big crash. There's nothing left in my memory from before. He taps his head.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: This will yield zero.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hang on. Rush thinks, touches a surface. Concentrates. Circuitry zaps from data coming off his hands. Connections illumina data races around walls and floors. Programs stop what they're doing, amazed by the feat. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 34 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 26

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Mega is astonished - and privately worried. Rush's data flow illuminates surfaces with images from HI memory - the opening light cycle race.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Remember, Krod? You were watching this lightcycle duel, a red guy and a green guy, head-to-head. Krod gawks at the image, but he's stumped.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: The green guy faked out the red guy, but the red guy double-faked the green guy. Bingo.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Okay! YES! And the green guy splattered big time! It was awesome! How could I forget that?! Splat happens in Rush's memory image. All goes white.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Where did the red guy go after that? You didn't crash right away.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: He escaped out this hidden exit - Krod's points to another screen. "Wanted" image of Tron.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: THAT GUY! The RED GUY!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Did you jack his coordinate?

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Tr165444.018! They slap high fives. Krod double-takes on Rush.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: And the green guy was YOU! You got rebooted?! They called you, um - Don't tell me, I got it, eh -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Call me Rush. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 34 35 36 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 27

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Yeah! Whatever. You're good. How'd you do that thing with your hands?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's complicated. You're coming with us to the old game grid. We're going to find Tron and shut him down.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Beats working. They head out. Krod falls in beside Mega, impressed by he

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Hey babe. Did I ever know you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush, Krod and Mega head deep into an obsolete, abandoned region of low-rez circuitry.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: The old game grid is this way - He spins. Rush and Mega aren't behind him. They've climbe inside a defunct I/O Port: Like a retro-tech temple.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: How do I uplink to the real world?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: The real world doesn't exist. Nobody can uplink. These ports were for simulation only.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Right... But how did those poor misguided fools boot up the Link?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: They stood in the center. Held their disk above their head. Rush pulls his disk off his back, aims it skyward. Concentrates. Energy flows off his feet, interacts with t I/O Port floor. RUBY COMMUNICATION BEAM shoots skyward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kelter and Phlegman report to Sinclair: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 36 37 38 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 28

dialogues.speaker: KELTER
dialogues.text: Intruder attempted another break-in. We patched the firewall, but our Manpower getting is maxed out.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Stay on it! Nobody sleeps! Guys hustle out. Sinclair wheels, as Meg storms in.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: There's a message on your secure link! Sinclair enters retinal ID. Text forms: INTRUDER IDENTIFIED.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Where is this coming from - ? Meg hurries to the screen.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: It's HIM. Text appears: I AM RUSH.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: My God, he's there.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Rush, it's Sinclair and Meg. Her words transform into text.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush raises his disk, beaming data into the great unknown Smiles as he downloads the response. Mega and Krod watch nearby.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I identified the intruder I/O PORT walls ZAP ENERGY, STRESSING Rush's CONNECTION -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Text appears: INTRUDER IS UPGRADED VERSION OF TRON. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 38 39 40 41 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 29

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Tron? Wasn't Tron one of our programs? Sinclair and Meg trade baffled looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor oversees construction. X-Takk Commander points to something in the distance. Beyond the horizon, the RUBY RED BEAM reaches to the heav Plexor sees it, alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Text forms in magenta circuitry - GOOD WORK PARTNER.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I have a plan to crash Tron. Mega turns with alarm.

dialogues.speaker: ABORT
dialogues.text: Walls THUNDER and CRASH IN - Rush leaps clear with his disk - MASSIVE ROMBALL (data reformatting orb) hurtles around th I/O Port, ZAPPING all it touches, de-rezzing data structu into neutral gray "blank matter". ROMBALL loops skyward. GIANT D-REZZ PROGRAM crashes down from above, retrieves ROMBALL - He's ENORMOUS, TOUGH, SINGLE-MINDED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sinclair and Meg hang on the broken transmission:

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Rush? Words appear: END OF LINE.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: He'd better not fail.  42 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 30

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: D-Rezz screams like a modem, hurls ROMBALL - Mega and Krod dive clear - ROMBALL misses them, but BLAZES DOWN two more I/O Ports. rezz retrieves ROMBALL, bears down on Mega and kKrod.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hey! Double points if you nail me! Bring it on! D-Rezz turns his ugly sights on Rush, baited away from Me and Krod. D-rezz flexes and ROARS, revealing an X-NET LOGO on his c

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Stop! End your routine! D-rezz corners Rush, hurls his ROMBALL - Ball fires every circuit in its path, bleaching away data energy. Rush dodges -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Cease! Desist! We're on the same team! Mega throws her disk, plings D-rezz on the skull. D-rezz turns on her - Rush runs, LEAPS on D-Rezz's back. Like riding a gorilla D-Rezz flips Rush to the ground, pins him with one mighty hand, raises his ROMBALL for the kill.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I'm X-Net too! Data flows from Rush's body, up D-Rezz's clamping arm. Radiant energy between predator and prey. Digits race in D-rezz's eyes. A code unlocks. He looks down, finally registering the X-Net markings on Rush's ou D-Rezz lets go of Rush, slumps back on his haunches. Lowe his head in shame.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: No, hey, hey big guy, don't take it so hard. We all have bad days. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 42 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 31

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: RUSH rolls the BIG ROMBALL over: A peace offering. Mega and Krod cautiously approach.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: He was carrying out his programming. All I/O Ports are scheduled for de- rezz. D-rezz hears this, happy to be understood. (He never talk

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Easy, big guy. No harm, no foul.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: D-Rezz, we can use a guy with your raw power. You ready to be a hero for X-Net? D-Rezz stands, clutches his ROMBALL. Reporting for duty.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Cool. Now I've got somebody I can boss around. D-rezz modem-growls at Krod.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Or not.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Let's get to the game grid. Rush leads them up an incline.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: (grudgingly, to Rush) You have a skill for manipulating other programs.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: When do I get a shot at hacking your code?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Never. Our operating systems are incompatible.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You act like I've got a virus. They come to a spectacular vista of the OLD GAME GRID. Lo resolution, uncool, largely forgotten. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 42 43 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 32

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: There it is.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: The place we nail Tron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obsolete, abandoned computer game entry portal, guarding entry to the old game grid beyond. An electro-tech carniv zone gone dark. No life in sight... Then: Beam of DATA ENERGY sling-shots at ground level, solidify to become: A slender, jumpy Program called I-BEEM. He wears the X-Ne logo and a cracked disk on his back. He's highly unstable and way unplugged from the system (like one of those Japa soldiers still fighting alone in the hills 10 years after WWII was over). I-Beem sees something - he PANICS, zapping away in characteristic streaks of airborne data. He reassembles i a hiding place, skittish, observing: Rush, Mega, Krod and D-Rezz arrive. See GIANT PILE of GAM VEHICLE PARTS blocking access to the grid. Rush picks up an old LIGHT WAND. Krod finds one too.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: D-rezz. Cut a path. D-Rezz hurls his Romball, ZAPS into VEHICLE PARTS. A dent

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: That's good. Keep doing it. D-rezz retrieves Romball for another whack - ZAP - DATA ENERGY BEAM snaps in front of them, becoming I Beem. He grips his rickety disk, challenging them.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Violation! Go away! Access denied!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Relax, buddy - Mega scans I-beem. He freaks, drops his disk, grabs for i

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Pound him to bits, D-rezz. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 43 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 33

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: D-Rezz raises his Romball to pulverize I-Beem. I-Beem freaks, ZAPS away in his data beam as Romball cras down. I-Beem reforms further way, then beside them - He snatches his pancake disk, the zaps away again, emerging then high on the pile of parts.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: He's wireless.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Freaky.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Searching data bank. "I-Beem". Security Specialist, damaged in service, rated unstable.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: (ranting from above) "Unstable"! Like they aren't?! They booted me off X-Net! I'll show them! I'm doing my subroutine out here! Nobody gets through this portal! He kicks parts - avalanche fills the gap D-rezz blasted.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: D-rezz, take out this blip. D-rezz cocks Romball. I-Beem freaks, sling-shots all over the place via his data beam, tossing his wobbly disk. Rush catches I-Beem's disk. Holds off D-Rezz.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hang on. I-Beem. We're from X-Net CPU. You're doing a great job out here. Everybody knows it Mega throws Rush a look. I-beem comes up, grateful.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: They do?!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: That's right. Now, have you seen a rogue Program around here? He's red. Super fast. Known as "Tron". Data zags to Rush, forming into: I-Beem. Wide-eyed. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 43 44 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 34

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: The red one! That illegal function! He blasts through here and JUMPS OVER THE TOP! I tell him access denied - he JUMPS RIGHT OVER like I was never there!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: When did he come through last?

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Right before you got here. Rush trades looks with Mega, Krod and D-Rezz. Trail is ho

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I-beem, we've got a plan to shut down that red violator. You're going to help us.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Let me at him!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: First, you've got to let us onto the game grid. I-Beem stiffens, reflexively vigilant. He scans the four them again, finally softening. He zaps to a wall near his giant barrier, then proudly pushes aside a thin panel. Be a corridor of game gear, view expanses to reveal:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush steps across the vast vector-graphic grid surface. Eerie. Quiet. Pure. Mega, I-Beem, Krod and D-rezz follow.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: This region is obsolete. Rush kneels, touches grid lines. Circuits energize, as hi energy surges in all directions. He draws in data.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: There's bits of Tron's code all over Krod, give D-Rezz and I-beem the escape coordinate Tron used on me. Krod's eyes flash data to I-Beem and D-rezz. "Tr165444.01 (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 35

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Coordinate captured. D-Rezz nods, palming his Romball.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: That's where Tron will bail out. We'll make sure he needs to. Go set up the trap. (to D-rezz) You only get one shot at this, big guy. Stop him but don't destroy him, right? He's got data I need. D-rezz grips Romball, grunts affirmation. He and I-beem head for the perimeter of the grid.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: If this is Tron's territory, he'll know we're here. He'll hide.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: He can't resist a grudge match. He'll take risks trying to beat me. That's how we trip him up. (to Krod) Whip it out. Rush unsheathes his LIGHT WAND. Krod pulls out his own LIGHT WAND. They both look at Mega. She's got no light wand.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: You didn't bring one?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I don't have one.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Hey, not a problem - Krod holds his light wand forward, activates it. LIGHT CY up-rezzes under him. He revs it, ready to go.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: (to Mega) - Hop on!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hang on, Krod. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 44 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 36

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Rush activates his light wand. LIGHT CYCLE up-rezzes unde him, with a special two tier seat for a second rider.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I upgraded my unit.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: You are awesome, man. I hate you. Mega considers. There's more on her mind she's not talkin about. She smiles at Rush, climbs on back of his light cy

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Mmmm... Hack me. A nod between Rush and Rush - they TAKE OFF. LIGHT CYCLES shoot across grid surface. Mega screams and clutches Rush, throwing her body against his, clamping her arms around him. Krod and Rush turn 90 degrees, rallying, passing each oth getting warmed up. It's familiar territory. Light cycles race toward each other on the same line. Mega holds Rush tight, eyes filling with terror.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Resource conflict! Fatal crash imminent! But Krod and Rush slow their light cycles with expert ski rolling safely to a halt, nose-to-nose. Directly over A BIG RED DOT. The only dot on the grid. Grid Center. Mega, Rush and Krod raise up to scan the horizon. It's al clear flat grid to the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Any sign of him?

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Everything looks the same to me. Everything looks the same. The same. The same.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Krod, snap out of it. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 44 45 46 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 37

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Tron will never expose himself. They watch, wait, pivot.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: The same...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: D-rezz and I-beem search grid edge, along the rocky bound I-beem zaps himself further along, finding: Glowing code numbers mark the end of each grid line. D-rezz grunts, points. One lights up "Tr165444.018" They follow the line off the grid, where it leads into a narrow rocky pass.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Yes, I see. Perfect trap. This is going to be good. Climb, climb!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush, Mega and Krod wait on their light cycles.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Its futile.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Look. SPECK moves on the horizon, turns a corner, stays on the horizon. Another corner. It's a light cycle, making a hug box around them.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Remember the plan, Krod. Don't bail out until the last millisecond. Lightcycle turns toward them, coming fast.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hang on tight, Mega. Mega hugs Rush.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Mmmm. They SPEED AWAY. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 46 47 48 49 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 38

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Approaching cycle comes at 90 degree angle, turns hard, c the distance. It's TRON. Heartless eyes, ruthless moves. Rush turns quick, baiting Tron. Tron turns to follow, com alongside. Krod runs interference, cuts sharp in front of Tron. It's a high-stakes speed-chase, narrowly missing side wal and rock outcroppings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I-beem zaps onto the grid, tracks horizon dots.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Here they come! He zaps back to the edge, signals upward. D-rezz straddle the rock passage above, ready to hurl his Romball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tron takes the lead in a three-way heat. Revs to breath- taking speed. Rush and Krod gain, coming up on either side of Tron. Tron looks to each opponent. His eyes lock on Mega. Mega stares into Tron's cold eyes, almost like she's tryi to signal him. But Tron returns his gaze forward, as the ROCKY EDGE looms closer.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Wuss! You call that speed!? Rush kicks in a hyper-burner, surging forward. Krod does the same. Tron responds with more speed. Rush and Krod have Tron sandwiched, heading for the rock edge. Tron pulls ahead, aiming for the hidden crevasse. Mega worries. Clings to Rush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: D-rezz, astride the crevasse, sees light cycles speeding way. He's got the Rom-ball poised to intercept Tron. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 49 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 39

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: I-beem de-rezzes into the grid, clearing the path. Rush and Krod taunt Tron into the trap... But, out of nowhere, Mega reaches to Rush's handlebars an turns 90 degrees too soon.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Hey, what are you - ?? Tron sees the bail-out, knows something's wrong. He looks ahead, sees D-rezz astride his crevasse escape root, rom- ball poised in the air Tron bails out 90 degrees, cutting behind Krod. Krod turn twice, ending up in Tron's lane. To the side, Rush's light cycle screams toward solid rock vibrating out of control. Rush grabs Mega and JUMPS OFF. They slide on the grid, holding each other. Krod's lightcycle heads for the rock escape passage.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: No! It's ME! Rush and Mega slide to a halt, in time to see: Their light cycle SMASHES rocks, explodes in a million bi

dialogues.speaker: I- I GOT SCARED
dialogues.text: Krod shoots gap. D-rezz is ready to smash him with his Romball.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: No! It's Krod! Tron is OVER THERE! D-rezz makes mental switch, hurls Romball. Romball bounces down solid rock, onto game grid, rolls wi ferocious speed, DIAGONALLY across the grid. Romball curves to track Tron - like a great bowling shot. Romball clips rear wheel of Tron's lightcycle. Lightcycle vaporizes. Tron skids and tumbles. I-beem zaps beside Rush and Mega. Krod and D-rezz join th (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 49 50 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 40

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: There he goes! Tron climbs over rocks, escaping through a TUNNEL.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We've got him now. Let's go! WHOOSH! Electro-fire Romball careens across grid, bearing down on them. Group DIVES CLEAR. D-rezz swings in a foot, stopping the Romball - inches sh of mowing down Krod.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I could have done that. He strobes, freezes, hits the deck

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stalking their prey: Rush, Krod, I-beem and D-rezz.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: We can't go any further. Ahead, vast old circuitry has been "eaten through" by dul throbbing greenish MEMORY LEAKAGE. Paths of unaffected material are narrow and maze-like.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Don't ask, dude.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: It's a memory leak, once it starts, it infects everything.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Touch it and you crash forever. We cannot risk it.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I agree. D-rezz grunts.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Then it's settled. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 50 51 52 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 41

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Krod turns to head home.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Stop. Listen to me. You might not believe there's a world outside of this one, but let's just say a guy named Sinclair is depending on me. If Tron got through here, then I can too. Who's with me? D-rezz steps forward, then I-Beem. Shamed, Krod joins the Finally, Mega makes it unanimous.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Good. I-beem, take D-rezz, see what's up ahead. We'll guard this portal until you come back. I-beem and D-rezz buddy up and depart on a recon mission. Krod pulls off his disk, nervously practices boomerang th

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Better show me how to use mine.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: No problem. It's all in the velocity- vector ratio. Rush pulls the disk off his own back. He throws - disk fl wild - he runs to retrieve it. Mega retreats to a side area, partially eroded by memory leakage. She finds the remnants of COM CIRCUITRY and star data beams into its transducer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor's vehicle circuitry forms image of Mega.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Report.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: We interfaced with Tron. He escaped into a dark zone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Around a corner, Rush comes to retrieve his disk. He paus to eavesdrop on Mega's communication: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 52 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 42

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: The Random One has proven effective?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: He is all glitches and bad data. He virtually got us de-rezzed. I recommend we terminate this mission. Rush listens, hurt and angry.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: No. Proceed. If you keep Tron on the run, he cannot attack X-Net

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: It's a poor allocation of resources.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You have your instructions. Circuits go dark. Mega turns, running smack into:

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: "All glitches and bad data." What's up with you? Ever since I got here, you've been working against me.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I act as Plexor programs me.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Blah blah blah. You've got you own processor. I can feel it working overtime. Did Meg program you to mess with me?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I have no match for "Meg" -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: First, you don't want to come with me, then you're all over me on the light cycle - so you can dump us over and blow the plan. We would have nailed Tron by now if it wasn't for you. What's your malfunction?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Don't troubleshoot me! Angry silence. Eyes locked. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 43

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: The most effective alternative is to return to the main CPU and anticipate Tron's next attack. She moves to exit past him. He snags her arm, pulls her back and KISSES HER. Energy ZAPS between them, racing through their body circu Rush downloads the spiky sensation. Mega remains cold and bewildered. Outside, Krod tosses his disk, moving to track as it arcs through the air. He notices Rush and Mega kissing. Digs i vicariously.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: You ram hog! His disk clunks him on the head. Mega breaks the kiss, backing off, conflicted. Arcs of en stretch between them, then snap loose.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's what I'm programmed to do. Mega tries to ignore the kiss. She exits past the guys.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: What were you doing with her?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Nothing. She had a glitch. I was just pinging her EPROM.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: She let you?

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: There's a way through! Rush, Krod and Mega hurry to see: I-beem zap-zap-zaps toward them, scared to death -

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Tron attacked us! D-rezz has him cornered! Rush stows his disk on his back -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We've got him now.  53 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 44

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eaten away by memory leaks, like swiss cheese. Rush, Mega, Krod follow I-beem along narrow paths of unaffected material. Krod trips, his LIGHT WAND tumbles and skates into memory leakage. It FRIES and de-rezzes, sucked into the molten silicon swamp.

dialogues.speaker: D-REZZ
dialogues.text: Akakakaka - Agggggggg - Sounds like a modem, but it's a BATTLE-CRY. Rush comes to a point above - and cut off from - the figh D-rezz advances along a narrow gantry, spinning his Romba ready to hurl at: TRON. Tron flips over memory leakage, gains position and throws his disk - Disk HITS D-rezz. Plasma-ball GASH, but D-rezz is tough. He takes the damage, cocks his Romball -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Guys! Go around - behind Tron! Rush darts down to help D-rezz. Mega, Rush hurry ahead. I beem zaps, zags and reforms, scared out of his mind. D-rezz hurls his Romball - Romball pings off two walls, comes at Tron from behind. Tron spins - milliseconds to spare - and flips clear. Retrieves his disk on the way down. Romball slams off a wall, heads back to D-rezz, but Tron' disk HITS IT, knocking it off course. D-rezz dives for ROMBALL - but it falls into the memory l and FRIES TO BITS. Tron plants for a clear shot at D-rezz. Rush JUMPS down from above, right in front of D-rezz.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Ouch! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 53 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 45

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: His ankle. He straightens, standing in front of D-rezz. Lays eyes on Tron.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hey! Pick on somebody your own size! D-rezz is twice as big as either of them. Tron's eyes are cold, lifeless, calculating. Scanning his new opponent without success.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You've got no data on me. Rush pulls his disk off his back, poised for a duel. Tron moves with calculation, grips his hyper-etched disk Circling his prey. Throws again -

dialogues.speaker: BRRANGG -
dialogues.text: Rush DUCKS - Tron's disk slams D-rezz. D-rezz tries to catch the disk but he's just too slow. Rush throws his disk. Beginner's luck - it banks off a wa and nearly smacks Tron. Rush snags it on the way back, be it tumbles into memory leakage. Tron jumps up two levels. Retrieves his disk.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: D-rezz, pull me up! D-rezz hoists Rush up. Fingers grab upper deck. Tron jockeys for position. Throws disk - Disk strikes D-rezz in the ribs. Blast damage. D-rezz loses footing. Rush grabs upper level. D-rezz slips toward memory leakage. Rush grabs D-rezz's hand - he weighs a ton. Mega, Krod and I-beem can't get here to help - (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 53 54 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 46

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hang on, man! HANG ON! But D-rezz's big hand slips out of Rush's. D-rezz PLUMMETS into memory leakage, zapping away in a bl of glory -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Noooo! He comes to his feet, facing Tron. Determined.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I know who you are. Encom security program Tr856 - TRON! Tron pauses. Processes.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Who is your User?? Tron glitches at the question.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Who programmed you?? I know your encryption code. Tell me your User or I shut you down. Tron throws his disk. Rush dodges. He sends waves of data energy through floor circuits, reaching into Tron's body.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I can shut you down with a nine digit code. WHO IS YOUR USER?? 392 - Tron's body animates painfully, as the first three code d click into place. Tron FLIPS away, breaking contact with floor. Data transf stops. Tron steals away through a tunnel. Rush pursues. Krod, Mega and I-beem clamber for a way to follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Circular, riddled with memory leaks. Rush hurries to the center. No sign of Tron. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 54 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 47

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Tell me, Tron! Who programmed you? Here's your encryption code! 3-6-2-

Rush sends data coursing into floor circuits. It radiates up walls, across bridges... And finds TRON in hiding. Data races into Tron's body. Six code numbers engage; he glitches. He LEAPS to breaks the contact, flinging his di Tron's disk SLAMS Rush. Rush tumbles off a ledge, danglin over a memory leak. Tron pounces in. Snags his disk Tron steps on Rush's hand. Pain energy jolts Rush's circu

dialogues.speaker: ARRGGHHH
dialogues.text: Rush slips, grabs a slim protrusion. Feet zapping an inch from the memory leakage. Tron throws his disk for a final time. It arcs wide, comi around directly at Rush. Tron leans down, gazing into Rush's eyes.

Burst of SEARING DATA surges off Rush's hands, radiating circuitry, loading into Tron's body. All nine code number LOCK in. Tron's body seizes. He fights the data intrusion, but his circuits sequentially SHUT DOWN. Tron's airborne disk wobbles and darkens. Tron tumbles off the edge, plummets past Rush. Disk misses Rush, skates into darkness. Mega, Krod and I-beem hurry in and see: Rush, climbing to safety. And below: Tron's body slips into the memory leakage, zap away to bits.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: You got him! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 48

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: But Mega looks dreadfully worried. She slips away... Krod and I-beem climb down and help Rush to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Game over, dude.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: You crashed him! Rush gazes off the precipice. Remains of Tron is consumed by the swamp of memory leakage.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's more than I wanted. Now I'll never know who his User is.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: We're heroes!

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: I will be upgraded!

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: They'll give us a slot in the main server!

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: I will be upgraded! I will be - Krod slams him, makes him stop.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Rush, now you can finish pinging Mega's EPROM! Rush looks around.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Where is Mega?

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: She was just here.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Right behind me.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Rush searches. He finds Tron's disk, picks it up. It's dark and lifeless, circuits gray.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Mega... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 54 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 49

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SOUNDS echo around them. Coming fast. Electro-metallic footsteps. Rush, Krod and I-beem bunch together and pivot. Black-clad FINITY FIGHTERS appear, blocking all exits. Di ready for attack. Rush double-takes on faces among them: QUANTZ, tall silen hardcore (looks like real-world Phlegman) And BOOLE, rotu seen it all (like real-world Kelter)

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I recognize... Trouble.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: They're scanning us.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I-beem, go for help. Zap your butt out of here. But I-beem freezes, terrified. Fighters tighten perimeter A hush. Footsteps. Clunk-zap... Clunk-zap.

dialogues.speaker: DARK FIGURE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: It had to happen. But why now of all times? Rush and Krod turn. Fighters defer to: A DARK FIGURE, limping forward, one leg badly deformed by data corruption.

dialogues.speaker: DARK FIGURE
dialogues.text: A User shows up. Rush is surprised, then pleased. Somebody finally gets it

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm a User. A Superior being. The first to enter this realm. And you are - ? Figure's circuitry lights. Finally, we see the face... It is FLYNN.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: The first.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Flynn. How can you be here? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 54 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 50

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: You know this dude?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yeah, he's a lunatic! I-beem panics, zaps away in an energy beam. He reforms further along for a "breath", then zaps further away. Thr FINITY FIGHTERS chase him. Rush is amazed to find him self in the presence of Encom' former leader. Flynn comes closer, recognizing Rush.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Rush Nortebi. I remember hiring you. They are equally dumbfounded.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Somebody tipped these guys off about us.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Not soon enough. Fighters step aside, Mega enters, furious at Rush.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: You weren't supposed to beat Tron. I thought for sure he'd finish you.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: You destroyed our last hope!

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I detect a pattern in her behavior

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: She's a spy. Mega and Rush ooze mutual contempt. Rush turns on Flynn.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: No wonder I couldn't figure it out. I assumed Tron User was on the outside! If I'd known this, I would blown past him and come straight for you. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 54 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 51

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Flynn yanks Tron's disk from Rush, peers over the precipi Below, the last of Tron is consumed by memory leakage. Flynn ponders Tron's lifeless disk. He falters on his bad leg. Mega throws an arm around to help him stand. Melanch energy courses between them.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I failed our cause.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: You did everything you could. They know each other well. Rush registers jealousy, but larger concerns prevail:

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Flynn never died... (dawning) Because your Quantum Digitizer worked. That's how you got here... I know - that's how I got here too. Flynn studies Rush, anger rising.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: The day after I hired you, you start sucking up to Sinclair. You thought I didn't know. Bet he offered your a partnership for this, right? You have no idea the damage you've done.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I'm only getting started. Man, you were the company joke. Now I see why. You melted down your lab to take this little joyride. You got stuck here so all you can do is wreck other people's hard work

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Open your eyes, geek. My lab was rigged. My "death" was no accident. I pushed the button just in time to escape... Almost in time. He indicates his deformed leg. Mega, Krod and the others listen with awed bewilderment. These two guys speak of a world unknown to them.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You're paranoid. Who would want you dead? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 54 55 56 57 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 52

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: The same guy I programmed Tron to shut down. Same one you've been sucking up to. Sinclair. And his cyber-henchman, Plexor Malicious grumbles from Fighters.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Too many of your brain cells have gotten zapped in here, old man.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Rush, you lamer! You've been working for the bad guy. Three Fighters return from the I-beem pursuit. Empty-hand

dialogues.speaker: FIGHTER ONE
dialogues.text: He got away. Flynn scowls at Rush. Sin number two. Flynn slips Tron's dead disk in a special case.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Let's move. X-Net goons will soon be all over this place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Energy zaps across grid, forming into I-beem. He's on the run, de-rezzing, zapping, reforming, bolting for

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I-beem de-rezzes, reforms, zaps himself toward the neares Net OPTIK HIGHWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fighters thread secret buffers and gates. Flynn carries Tron's disk, helped along by Mega. Rush and Krod are held prisoner, prodded by Quantz and Bo They cross a DATA BRIDGE, drawn to the sounds of SHREIKIN PANIC.  58 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 53

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vast, retro, multi-level. Diverse and beautiful energy fl Circular architecture. Flynn, Mega, Rush, Krod and Fighters come to a stunning v GLEAMING NEW X-NET DATA OPTIK HIGHWAY is being constructe right through the heart of the city.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: (to Rush...) I hired Sinclair as Encom's business guy, so I could do the dreaming. Right off, he wanted to "capture the market" on data transmission. Had this plan called "X-Net", based on flawless efficiency, hyperlock security, encryption protocol uniformity. Blah blah. I was the boss, I told him to forget it. I knew it could go bad. But the guy had trouble taking no for an answer. He arranged for my lab to melt down. Sinclair took over my company and put X-Net on a fast-track. And here's where it's brought us. City descends into panic. X-Takk Troops evict Programs, seize prisoners and mercilessly hunt down resistors. X-Net Construction Crews build the Optik Highway with relentless precision, blasting aside the old city's splen structures.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What are they doing??

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Beating the competition. X-Takk Troops storm closer - by the hundreds.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: They've got us outnumbered.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: We've got to choose our battles wisely. This way! He leads them down a secret portal, into:  59 60 61 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 54

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Group moves along a catwalk, coming to a view of: X-Takks herd Captured Resistor Programs, lining them up f execution.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Rush, why is X-Net doing this?! A Kid Program runs to this Captured Father Program.

dialogues.speaker: KID PROGRAM
dialogues.text: No! Let my daddy go! X-Takks haul Kid Program clear, then BLAST the Captives w de-rezz weapons. Captives glitch, thrash and expire.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: How long has this been going on?

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: For years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like any other day. Except a high-rise building's lights flicker off. A subway escalator stops. A traffic light turns red on both sides. Cars honk, tempers flare. A TV store: All TVs in the window flip to one channel, wh happens to be running a commercial for X-Net - theme: Tot Data Security".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Takk Troops line up more Captive Programs.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Sinclair never told us about this. X-Net is creating the very terror that makes people want the security of X-net!

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: No more glitches, freeze-ups or shut- downs. Once X-Net is open, Plexor will destroy all other systems. All data flow will be controlled by his Master User - (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 61 62 63 64 65 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 55

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Sinclair.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: All data flow - Sinclair's to control and abuse. Bank accounts, medical histories, your Blockbuster account your buying patterns, your e-mail. And to think, Rush - all this time, you've been working 24/7, trying to impress a him. X-Takk troops blast Captive Programs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ATM machine goes berserk

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Block full of Pedestrians suddenly - and simultaneously - can't get their cell phones to work.

dialogues.speaker: DUSK
dialogues.text: GPS navigation system map flips around.

dialogues.speaker: GPS VOICE
dialogues.text: Turn left now. Turn right now. Left. Right. NOW! SUV Driver panics, pulls a hard turn and SMASHES a BUS.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Sinclair betrayed me.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Finally you get it.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Tron was our late hope.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We've got to stop this! X-Takks hear Rush's shouts. An overwhelming force. Flynn and Mega shove Rush into a tunnel, closing the port  66 67 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 56

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn hastens their journey.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Rush was trying to expose us!

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: They didn't see us. Keep moving! Mega, Boole and Quantz move along, shoving Krod and Rush.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We've got to tell people on the outside -

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Plexor shut down all the I/O ports. Only HE communicates with the outside. Sinclair holds all the cards. Flynn turns on Rush - one of Sinclair's cards.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: How did you get here?!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Megan Randall sent me. (points out Mega) Her User. She fixed your lab and sent me here to take out Tron.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Megan Randall? I remember her Smart, wise beyond her years. I can't believe she'd fall for Sinclair's lies. He glances at Mega, then shoves Rush along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn, Mega, Fighters bring Rush and Krod into the clande Fighter base. Like a wartime casualty center, with corrup Fighter Programs lining corridors.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What happened to them?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Try to attack Plexor head-on, this is what happens. Because of you there will be millions more. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 57

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They arrive at a laser-barred JAIL BLOCK, where a dozen B X-Takk Troops are held prisoner.
