dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Lock up these two. We'll hold them for ransom. Or use them for target practice. Flynn and Mega turn to go. Boole and Quantz use PROD LANC to herd Rush and Krod.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Flynn. You think I'm Sinclair's flunky, but I'm not. Flynn pauses. Rush speaks low, so X-Net Captives can't he

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I'm sorry about Tron.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Yeah, we're - Sorry?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We were just doing a job, we had no way of knowing the truth.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: No way at all.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Flynn, I was wrong about you. You've been doing the right thing in here. Plexor has to be shut down. Sinclair has to be exposed.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Like he said.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Krod and I are ready to help.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: We are? Flynn puzzles over Rush.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Mega, what do you read in him? Mega circles Rush, scanning his circuits.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Independent operating instructions. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 68 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 58

dialogues.speaker: MEGA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He will act as necessary to increase probability of his own survival.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You don't know me.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: He cannot to be trusted.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Trust?! You're the one who's been lying to me the whole time! Rush points a finger at Mega - BOLT of ATTRACTION ENERGY shoots off his finger, ZAPS her on the nose. Mega's circuits OVERLOAD, she flies back - Rush, startled, looks at his finger Fighters muscle Rush and Krod away. Flynn holds Mega, anger re-ignited.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Mega's been risking her existence for our cause, lamer. That's more than you'll ever do. (to Fighters) Lock them away! Fighters toss Rush and Krod in the JAIL BLOCK with the BI TAKK soldiers. Does finger-signs, body circuit language.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Yo, s'up? Eh... X-Net rules, man.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hey Krod... Shut down. Rush peers out of his cage, watching Mega go. She turns f a final scowl, then exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Takk Troops sound alert. Outside the main portal, energy zaps and splinters above ground circuits, collecting to become: I-beem, reforming, running, stumbling. Some body parts ou of sync, catching up. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 59

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK
dialogues.text: Halt! State encryption code!
Breathless, he loses count. Zaps beside himself. Again:
Portal opens.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You are positive Tron was destroyed?

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: I observed it directly! Rush turned Tron into vaporware! X-Takk Troops trade looks, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Rush claims to be a User! He must be! He is awesomely skilled! Plexor hardens.

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK COMMANDER
dialogues.text: Users do not exist.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: He is but a randomized Program, he got lucky. To our benefit.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Rush and Krod were surrounded by stealth fighters! They were led by another User called Flynn!

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Flynn?? Plexor's circuitry strobes in dark troubled hues. An imag appears on his archive screen: Flynn.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Yeah, that's the one!

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Flynn... is here? He is the one behind this scheme to crash X-Net? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 69 70 71 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 60

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: I know where they are! Rush and Krod need our help!

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: And what of Mega?

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: We couldn't find her. I'm certain they captured her too! Plexor processes - his cranial circuits burn deep amber.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Tron is gone, but his User lives? Plexor turns to I-beem, grateful. Removes I-beem's flimsy broken disk, studies it gently.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Good work does not go unrewarded at X-Net. Would you like to be upgraded?

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Yes, Plexor, very much so. Plexor energizes a REWARD PORTAL. Shimmering golden light beckons I-beem. He eagerly enters - and gets ZAPPED. I- beem emerges out the other side, a zombie-like X-Net Dron joining a security crew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor enters, raises his disk. RUBY RED BEAM connects.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sinclair paces amid a buzz of manic activity. TVs show ne of escalating global data crashes. In comes a MARKETING V

dialogues.speaker: MARKETING VP
dialogues.text: You're not going to believe this!

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Convince me.

dialogues.speaker: MARKETING VP
dialogues.text: Sales office has been flooded with calls. Major banks, airlines, city governments, the presidents of 26 nations - They all want to sign up for X-Net now. We're not even on- line yet and we're a hit! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 61

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Sinclair absorbs his good fortune. Smirks.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: We're the only port in the storm. Execs cheer, trade high-fives. Sinclair notices a blip on his private data screen. The office clears, doors shut. Sinclair, alone now, inter with his screen. Text: INTRUDER HAS BEEN ELIMINATED.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Brilliant. But: THERE REMAINS AN AREA OF UNCERTAINTY.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: What uncertainy?

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: The User called Flynn is here. Sinclair reads the text, blind-sided. Sees a photo of Fly

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: That's impossible.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Flynn commanded the intruder Tron.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: You've got to be wrong about this.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: I was programmed error-free. By you. Sinclair ponders the unimaginable.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Flynn... escaped?!

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: He leads a group who seek to prevent the opening of X-Net. The one called Rush has joined them. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 72 73 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 62

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Rush? My guy? What lies has Flynn filled him with?

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Or what truths? Sinclair peers at the screen text, agitation growing. A news article pops up, recounting the lab accident and Fly "death". X-Net launch countdown ticks.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: This world can never know all I have done. You have a plan to contain Flynn?

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Don't just contain him. Destroy him.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Instructions received. And the one called Rush? Sinclair mulls for two seconds, then:

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: He knows too much. Get rid of him.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Instructions received.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Krod get chummy with cell-mate X-Takks. They moc fight together, getting insider tips.

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK 1
dialogues.text: And whatever you do, don't let them hit you here... Indicates a CIRCUIT NEXUS on his lower SPINE.

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK 1
dialogues.text: All X-Net Programs have a weak spot there.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hear that, Krod? Never let them get to your weak spot. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 73 74 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 63

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Krod twists around, playing with his spinal nexus.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Gurfle! I never knew that. Pull back to see: Flynn secretly observes Rush. Pondering. Boole arrives behind him.

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: We're ready for you now. They head upstairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn reviews Fighter training. Troops throw disks, battl in pairs, repair weapons, tweak armor circuitry. Flynn carries Tron's dark disk, contemplating it. He move past a line-up of his finest Fighters.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: If X-Net is allowed to open it's the beginning of the end of a free and open cyberspace. We can't let Plexor get away with this. Our game plan has not changed. Tron was specially programmed to break into X-Net and shut down power supplies. We would then exploit these weak points and cripple the system. Tron's role was essential One of you must take his place. He holds up Tron's disk.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Who among you can power Tron's disk and carry out his mission? All Fighters take a step forward.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: It's the most dangerous job. If you're not up for it, nobody's going to blame you. All stand firm. Flynn lays Tron's disk in the first Fighter's hands. Figh summons his will, causing the disk to glow faintly. But i soon goes dark again. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 74 75 76 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 64

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Next Fighter holds the disk, bearing down, animating the circuits... But he buckles and the disk falls dims. Mega worries: One-by-one, Fighters fail to power Tron's disk. Flynn reaches the end of the line. Mega puts her hands out to receive the disk. Flynn hesitates, then hands her Tron's disk. Mega clenches it, concentrating deeply. Her energy infuse the disk, animating its circuits stronger than anyone. Bur soon, her eyes strobe, her body circuits overload. She lets go. Tron's disk thunks the floor, goes dark Mega hardens her resolve.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: There are other ways to crash Plexor I will return to him, he still trusts me. I will get close and crash him with direct contact -

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: It's futile. Plexor's personal defense measures are massive. Other Fighters chime in, but they don't know what to do. A FIGHTER SENTRY dashes in.

dialogues.speaker: FIGHTER SENTRY
dialogues.text: Enemy scouts, headed this way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush, Krod and X-Tekk Prisoners heard COMMOTION in the ma hideout area above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phalanx of X-NET SECURITY CRUISERS moves in, mashing circuitry - X-TEKK TROOPS rowst Civilian Programs. Plexor commands LEAD CRUISER.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Disperse to all sectors! CRUISERS with X-Takks split in several directions. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 76 77 78 79 80 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 65

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: X-Takk Squads crash fleeing programs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRUISERS with X-Takk Troops ravage grid, moving into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Net CRUISERS crash through. ASSEMBLER UNITS spew freshl programmed BRIDGES over memory leak swamps. X-Takk troops hustle deeper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Takks storm in. Specialized units scan memory leaks, de code fragments - schematic images of Tron.

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK SPECIALIST
dialogues.text: The invader Tron crashed here. Plexor surveys the place.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: This was a preferred gaming arena for the User called Flynn. His moves are predictable, recursive, easily traced. Plexor activates a Q-MINATOR. Device emits a PLANE of coherent pulsing energy, which scans the area, illuminate the RACING DATA BIT PATTERNS within all circuits, program and surfaces. (An x-ray-like device that reveals all comp machine code underlying every cyberspace object.) A trail of code BURNS HOT NEON GREEN.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: That way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Net Cruisers crash the city. Programs scatter Plexor commands Lead Cruiser, sweeps Q-MINATOR. Running Civilian Programs are rendered "naked" by the beam, bodie revealed as volumes of buzzing data bits "101001110101011

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Down there. Cruisers deploy DE-REZZ BEAMS, slicing open structures. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 80 81 82 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 66

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Flashing bitstorm, screaming Civilian Programs - The wrat of X-Net is unleashed upon the city.

dialogues.speaker: CRASH
dialogues.text: Walls slice and crumble - X-NET CRUISERS blast their way in, coming to a stop in pr formation. Plexor emerges from Lead Cruiser. Stops. Looks. The place is empty. Not a fighter in sight.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Fan out! Search every buffer and cache!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey! Down here!

dialogues.speaker: KROD, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Get us out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor and X-Takks hustle down, finding: Rush, Krod and the X-Takk Prisoners, behind bars. X-Takk Specialists hack the system, power down jail bars. Prisoners step forth and retrieve their impounded disks.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Dude, are we glad to see you!

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You destroyed Tron.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yes... Where is Mega?

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: She's not with you? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 67

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: She's with Flynn! I mean, totally WITH Flynn -!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: (cuts off Krod, covers) Flynn was smart enough to interrogate her first.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: (duped) She contains sensitive data. Flynn cannot be allowed to hack her Rush and Krod notice: Behind Plexor and his Soldiers, BOO QUANTZ and FINITY FIGHTERS move into position. They signa Rush and Krod not to blow their cover. Rush makes Krod comply. An ambush is ready to spring.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yeah, only - We kicked Flynn's butt, too.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: You should have seen it. Flynn won't be a problem. X-Takk Prisoners are confused.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Then... Why were you imprisoned?

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK
dialogues.text: Ambush! Fighters POUNCE, throwing disks - Rush grabs a PROD LANCE, nails two X-Takks on their spina nexus. They go down hard.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Delete them all! Plexor hurls an ENERGY BALL - Rush DUCKS, grazed by its FRACTAL comet trail. Fighters beat back Plexor. His concerns shift. He ducks into an ascension shaft - Rush and Krod are left fighting back-to-back, out-manned three-to-one.  83 84 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 68

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor races upward, but is blocked by a unit of Fighters Plexor pulls off his special TRIANGULAR DEATH DISK - FLIN it. Disk ricochets off three Fighters, knocking them out. Another lethal fling and the remains Fighters fall. Plexor retrieves his death-disk with heart-stopping accur darts into:

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: It's a TRAP! X-Takk Troops react, bolting for their Cruisers. Floor circuits ACTIVATE - X-Takks ZAP and FREEZE. Fighters appear from all directions. Disks fly - X-Takks wield stout MAZER weapons - Even the corrupted Fighter Programs pitch in, working in clever teams, chipping away at Plexor's forces. But X-Takks have tougher armor and more awesome weapons. X-Takk Mazer cuts down Fighters by the dozen, leaving the corrupted or shut down.

dialogues.speaker: UPPER LEVEL
dialogues.text: Flynn struggles to help wounded Fighters - He captures a Mazer and uses it against X-Takks... But Flynn can't move well on his bad leg. He watches his troops getting trounc

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Retreat! Over that way! Move around their flank! ZAP! A Mazer blast strikes Flynn's bad leg.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Arrrgghhh! Mega appears, throws her disk with deadly accuracy. The offending X-Takk Soldier crashes. Millions of bits spray over main arena - fractal fireworks. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 84 85 86 87 88 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 69

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Mega grabs Flynn from falling. They make for a bridge. Flynn slaps a wall panel. Trigger circuit activates, surg down into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Circuit energizes a sector of floor circuits, which overload and BLAZE - frying twenty X-Takks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Krod use puny PROD LANCES against fearsome X-Tak Rush charges an X-Takk dude, Krod gets cornered by anothe Rush dodges his death blow, spine-zapping his foe... Krod prepares to die, as X-Takk Bully pins him with a Mazer an squeezes the trigger. X-Takk Bully seizes, freezes, crashes. Mazer barrel falls away from Krod - he's lucky to be alive. Rush stows Zap Wand, grabs Mazer and yanks Krod to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I'll never let you forget it.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Rush, we're screwed! Now everybody's after us!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Nah, we're cool. We're with them! Boole and Quantz sweep past, gathering Rush and Krod into their unit. They charge up the ascension shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor hurls DEATH DISK, takes out Fighters. He spins, looks up: Glimpses Flynn and Mega running along ledge. He heads after them, working his way upward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Krod emerge behind an X-Takk Cruiser. They knock out two X-Takk Soldiers, steal their MAZER WEAPONS. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 70

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fighter Specialists hustle in, attach ENCRYPTION PODS to Cruiser. Data meltdown radiates from the key, "burning" through the Cruiser like paper Cruiser implodes.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Awesome! Can I do one? Rush spots Plexor heading to upper levels. He pursues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn and Mega help corrupted Fighters toward the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Quick. This way.

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: A wounded Fighter is struck down. Triangular DEATH DISK swings wide, takes out another, then the last... Mega and Flynn spin to see: Plexor steps forward, retrieving his Death Disk. Blocking their exit.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Mega, move aside! I will finish him! Instead, she shields Flynn's body.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Strike us down. There will always be more to oppose you. Sinclair's circuits snap with rage.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: What programming has he installed in you??

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Flynn! Go with the others! Run!

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: I'm not leaving you with this phreak. Plexor brings back his DEATH DISK. In the shadows: Rush, creeping along the periphery, gaini position on Plexor. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 89 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 71

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Plexor, get over the control thing. Plexor readies his disk to FIRE -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Drop the disk! He pivots, hurls Death Disk at Rush. Rush dives clear, sends his data energy into surrounding circuits. Circuits activate around Plexor, surging PAIN DATA into his body.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: I'll be damned.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Rush?! But Plexor resists Rush's data infusion, freezing the cir around his feet. Cutting off the flow. Death Disk slices walls, arcing back toward Plexor - Rush LEAPS at Plexor.

dialogues.speaker: BLANG
dialogues.text: Plexor is solid-state, like a cast iron statue. Rush flip airborne, goes down hard.

dialogues.speaker: ARRGH
dialogues.text: Plexor considers Rush, astonished by his audacity.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: (sucks air) Is that all you've got? It's a millisecond's distraction - Death Disk returns to Plexor's hand, but swings wide and GRAZES his ARM, leavin swath of painful CORRUPTION.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Raagghh! X-Takks hustle in with hefty NEGABYTE BLASTERS.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Rush! This way! Flynn, Mega and Flynn dash across the bridge. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 89 90 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 72

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Delete them! NEGABYTE BEAMS slice walls, erasing all data in their pat Rush, Flynn and Mega dive into a tunnel, escaping by inch

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush, Mega and Flynn, pursued, rendezvous with Krod, Bool and Quantz.

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: This way! Down the pipe! Rush helps Krod, Quantz and Boole into a data pipe. One b one, they WHIRL away in the flow of chromatic data. Flynn and Mega have a breathless moment to consider Rush.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: He's better than I thought.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: He's been sent for a reason.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: What reason?

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Don't know yet. Sometimes we have to trust the bigger plan. Mega struggles to compute. Rush turns to help Flynn down the pipe. Mega assists. Flynn's wounded leg gives out, he slips. Rush holds him, but loses his balance, slides down.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Mega! Quick! Jump! But she hesitates - VELCRONIC BEAMS snag her from behind - pulling her back o the ledge. Rush tumbles down the flume, glancing back to see: Mega, hauled away by X-Takk Troops.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 90 91 92 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 73

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fighters, Krod, Rush and Flynn surf down the data WHIRL accelerating away from the hot zone. X-Takks jump in after them, but are all swallowed by the flow - gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bashed and ruined, littered with fallen Fighters. Plexor nurses his injured arm, commanding the mop-up. X-Takks bring Mega to their leader.

dialogues.speaker: X-TAKK 1
dialogues.text: We got her! Mega stands defiant. Plexor regards her sternly. Extends his hand to her shoul cupping the back of her neck.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You committed a fatal error. DATA ENERGY SURGES from his eyes, flushing her body circu She fights intensifying input, but soon weakens. She glit and shuts down, falling into the arms of X-Takks.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Their strategies and tactics lie encrypted in her memory. Bring her! I will hack from her what I need.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn leads the way, surfing the chromatic hyper-speed fl with Quantz and Boole. Rush and Krod struggle to master the technique, rolling, slipping, recovering, grabbing each other

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I got it, I got it, I got it. Boole surfs around them, heading into a squirrely curve.

dialogues.speaker: AWWWWWWW
dialogues.text: Krod swings high, out of control. Dumps in front of Rush who flips him upright. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 92 93 94 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 74

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Shove it! Go! Rush and Krod swerve and gathers speed, shooting past Qua Boole and Flynn - pivoting to surf BACKWARDS!

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I remember now! Nothing to it!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Check it out! Rush flips up and surfs on his hands. Krod attempts to ma the move.

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: Look out!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: TURN AROUND
dialogues.text: Rush and Krod crane around to see: DATA PIPE spills into a massive DATA FLUME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Krod plummet into surging hot data, out of contr Flynn and Fighters expertly surf huge waves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn, Boole and Quantz drag Rush and Krod from data shal Everyone's circuits are hot and overloaded.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I'm cool. Not a problem. They let him go him go. Krod glitches, collapses. Rush gets to his feet, head spinning.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: They took Mega. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 75

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: She can handle herself for a while.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: How do we attack Plexor next? Flynn sizes up his new convert.

dialogues.speaker: QUANTZ
dialogues.text: You're with us now?

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: Do you know hard it is? Opposing the power of Plexor?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's like the forty-sixth level of ConquerDome 6.1, while winning a side game of Tetras Ultra, doing six Instant messages and debugging a demo. Boole, Quantz and Krod are confused, but Flynn gets it.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: All at the same time.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I'm there. Krod too.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Say what? Flynn accepts a handshake from Rush.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: We're going to need all the help we can get. Boole, can we make it to the dark zone from here?

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: There is one possible route.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: We'll meet up with the code monkeys and combine forces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Group sets out across a vast region of unpowered circuitr  96 97 98 99 100 101 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 76

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hordes of Captured Programs are lined up for termination. Among them: Wounded Fighters from the hide-out raid.

dialogues.speaker: FIGHTER 1
dialogues.text: We gave it everything.

dialogues.speaker: FIGHTER 2
dialogues.text: Interface. We can resist.

dialogues.speaker: FIGHTER 3
dialogues.text: Interface. They move close, holding each other. X-Takks FIRE. De-rez beams zap them to bits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Computer Users react with frustration, as their programs crash (Users correspond in appearance to the Programs who just got zapped.) Web ads sell the virtues of X-Net

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fire sprinklers fire off for no reason. Workers rush away sprayed from above. Assembly line full of partially-assem video recorders get dowsed with water

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pilots react: Navigational instruments glitch and fail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Net sales rise higher, as TV news grows bleaker Sinclair is distracted by a data file: News stories about the death of Flynn. The laboratory "accident".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor. Lording over the grand-scale construction. Steril design, sleek lines, enormous capacity. X-Net Drone Workers assemble beams, girders, circuitry. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: X-Net OPTIK HIGHWAY NETWORK blasts through old systems an extends across cyberspace with alarming speed.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Is completion on schedule?

dialogues.speaker: X-NET BUILDER BOSS
dialogues.text: On schedule. Plexor boards his Cruiser, which SPEEDS onto a completed stretch of X-Net OPTIK HIGHWAY. He's the only vehicle in sight, hogging a thousand brand-new lanes of data express Plexor accelerates, relishing the thrill of unchecked pow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor's Cruiser speeds through a new, as-yet unused X-Ne switching station. It's heavily secured. X-Takk troops defer to their supreme leader Plexor veers onto a proprietary side-route, bound for

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Firewall apertures cool, anticipating Plexor's arrival. Encryption portal opens. Plexor's Cruiser glides in. Portal closes. Firewalls reactivate, blazing red-hot, sealing the fortre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Towering corridors. Powerful armored X-Takk Guards stand pairs at every portal, corner and column. Plexor strides past, steps into a special GATE. Data beam react with his circuitry. Encryption key resolves. Gate opens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor strides across the spare, sleek space. On a slab lies Mega, radiated from above by READER BEAMS. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 105 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 78

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Plexor considers her glowing body circuits. Studies emerg data patterns. Satisfied, he halts the process. Beams go dark.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Boot up. Mega awakens, sits up. She sees the device, then Plexor

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: You treat me like I've been corrupted.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: I cannot predict the random effects Flynn might have caused in you.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: You programmed me to gather intelligence. That's all I've ever done.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: How long have you known Flynn?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Enough time to gain his trust.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Your behavior was highly authentic.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: To him. It had to be.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Have you allowed Flynn to complete a full interface with you?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I am programmed to allow such access only to you, Plexor. Her eyes lock on him. He is satisfied.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Flynn claims to be a User. As did the one called Rush.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Users do not exist.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You have seen nothing to make you doubt this? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 79

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: They possess no powers beyond those of routine Programs?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I have no knowledge of such powers. She steps down. They walk out of the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Still, there is something about them I cannot compute. Flynn plans to attack me, doesn't he?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Yes. And Rush will fight by his side.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Where will they strike?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Flynn does not decide until the hour of his attack. But he trusts me completely. when he knows the place, I will know it as well.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Perfect. They will be met with a final thrashing. Yes, let them come. They pass through the gate, arrive in the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Have you further instructions for me?

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: None for now. But stay close. They lock gazes. Barcode data surges between them.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You came to me full of glitches and random routines. Look at you now. What an extraordinary piece of programming I have made of you. I created X-Net to the same standard of flawless beauty. Soon, its perfection will become all that is, and all that ever will be. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 105 106 107 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 80

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: All events remain under your control. With a smirk and a final jolt of data, Plexor leaves her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor crosses into his inner sanctum. Raises his disk initiates RUBY BEAM link with Sinclair. Mega appears on a balcony above, in the shadows, secretly observing Plexor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Howling, barren, dim. Circuitry left unpowered for eons. Rush and Krod follow Flynn and Fighters, into treacherous canyons, across vast planes. Rush hears something and pulls the group behind cover

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Over there! Three massive X-NET X-PORTER VEHICLES rumble by. Imprison in the rear are hundreds of Programs. Cruisers blast a pa through mountains and speed away.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Those Programs think they're just being transferred!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Can we take out those X-Net guys?

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Our forces are too thin. We can't risk a battle that would reveal this position. From another direction appear two Code Monkey Programs.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK B3T
dialogues.text: Flynn! Down here!

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: Flynn! Enter. We configured a base. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 107 108 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 81

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Good to see you guys. When did the X-Net goons start patrolling all the way out here?

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK B3T
dialogues.text: They're everywhere now. Taking all Programs by force.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: Come. There is much to report! They head down into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deteriorating silicon lattice. Flynn, Rush, Krod and Figh arrive to a meager encampment.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK N1J
dialogues.text: Greetings.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Hey guys. This is Rush and his main man Krod. They defected from Plexor's forces to fight with us. A buzz of hope penetrates gloom. Nobody has defected from Plexor before.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK N1J
dialogues.text: We made progress decoding X-Net's power supply encryption.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Excellent. Let's see. In a make-shift lab, CODE MONKEYS demonstrate, working at mind-boggling speed, assembling a small intricate HOLOGON DEVICE (conical pyramid-shaped encryption key).

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I've seen that somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It's the encryption pattern on Plexor's disk.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Good eyes. We've got Mole Programs who score chunks of Plexor's personal code anywhere they can find it. These guys fit the pieces together (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 82

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It can take a quadrillion combinations.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: We just snagged the last piece, but the battle cost us big time.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: How many of you crashed? Heads shake somberly.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: The Teraflop Boys? Algebrat?

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: All that survive, you see standing here.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Oh Geez. Flynn falters on his bad leg. Quantz and Boole support hi

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Time is running out! Rush approaches Code monkeys as they toil blur-speed, try to fit the final code piece - a flat square. Pyramidal HOLOGON looks exactly like the X-Net desk toy we saw in R cubicle. Rush sees: pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Yow. I get tired just watching these dudes. Compilers try to fit the square inside the

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Just for laughs, try putting the circle on top of the pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONKS
dialogues.text: (unison) That's incongruous.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: If I'm wrong, ding me.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: What have we got to lose? Try it. Code Monkeys place the square on top of the pyramid. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 108 TRON 2.0 Jefferies

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Bingo. Square spins into Hologon lattice. Not bad. 83 a circle, latches and LIGHTS the entire Intricate 3D code patterns ANIMATES.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Good thing you didn't terminate us.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: How do we use this thing to shut down Plexor?

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: (picks up hologon) It's a copy of Plexor's master key. We can break into any X-Net facility and fry the power supply.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: But once Plexor knows we have it, he'll change the code.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Yep. We've got one shot. Then we

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: should take out the power supply to Plexor's main server.

dialogues.speaker: GROUP
dialogues.text: Yes! Take out Plexor's central server! Hang on,

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: guys, that's not as easy as it sounds -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I was inside the main server, I saw how it's laid out.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I used to work there! I'll recognize where everything is! CODE MONK N1iJ We can take it!

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: Hit Plexor where he lives! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 108 109 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 84

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Even with this key, it won't -

dialogues.speaker: QUANTZ
dialogues.text: We can pull it off, can't we Flynn? One final assault on Plexor's central server?

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: Shut him down forever? All eyes on Flynn. Rush's naivete has ignited false hope the Fighters.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Of course we can. Flynn forces a smile.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Hey, the future depends on us. How could we fail?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sinclair comes off the secured elevator, finds Meg and De at work on Quantum Digitizer.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: It's almost fixed. I'll be able to bring back Rush soon -

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Excellent work. Unfortunately, I'm shutting down this project.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Something came up. The company is at stake. I can't go into details.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: But Rush would have no way to return!

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Meg. I will never hold you responsible. This is a tough call, but it's mine. Dismantle and destroy all of this equipment and software. Immediately. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 109 110 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 85

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Well -

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: Meg... I'm not asking.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: I understand. He shoots a look and exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Compiler Crews work at megahertz speed. OPTIK HIGHWAYS ex and converge. Switching stations assemble. Crews shift to new assignments. Pull wide to see dismal ground below. Dark zone, emitting woeful blips of random energy. Pillars descend from X-Net crews above and SMASH into the old silicon, planting themselves deep and impervious. Rush stands on a vista point, aghast as X-Net constructio dominates the landscape.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: It's a bummer being on the losing team, huh Rush? Flynn sits nearby, trying to patch his corrupted leg.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We'll trash X-Net. Then we'll go back to the our world and expose what Sinclair's done. He looks at Krod, Boole, Quantz and Code Monkeys in the distance, preparing for battle.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Do they have any idea our world exists? Do they understand what a User is?

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Programs once connected freely with their Users. But Plexor shut down the I/O ports, severing all links. He controls all contact with the world we once knew. Programs operate on his instructions or none at all. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 86

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Or yours.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: It's nothing to brag about. We're getting our butts kicked.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It there a way to contact Meg? She can transport us back to our world. Maybe it's better if we fight Sinclair on his own turf. Flynn lays a somber gaze on his eager Fighters.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: I gave up the idea of going back a long time ago... You should too.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Sinclair didn't get where he is by being dumb. Even if we survive Plexor's forces in here, Sinclair will make sure we never get back home.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: But... Meg said -

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: I'm sure she'll do everything she can. It might not be enough. Flynn removes a cover-plate from his leg, trying to hide damage from Rush. Suspicious, Rush pulls the plate aside.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Oh, man. Flynn's data corruption has worsened. His leg throbs with the drab glow of irreversible MEMORY DRAIN.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Why didn't you tell anyone it was this bad? Flynn looks at his leg. Then at Rush.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Rush. I think Meg suspects the truth about Sinclair. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 87

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That's why she sent you here. She knew you're the one guy who could find out.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I thought she hated me.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: She believed in you more than you believed in yourself. It sinks in. Wow.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Do we really have a shot at winning against Plexor?

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: We have his master key. And we have Mega working on the inside.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Mega... Are you sure about her? I get the feeling she plays both sides.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Plexor programmed her to perform his will. He's a control freak. I'm not. I programmed her to have a will of her own. Whatever she decides, it's up to her.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Sounds dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Sometimes you've got to trust the bigger plan. Krod and Fighters approach.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: Ready to rock and roll.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Guys... Rush is right about our final attack. If we've only got one shot, we should go for Plexor's central server. If we insert the hologon key in the main power supply, we can trigger a meltdown. Plexor will be have his best troops standing in our way. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 110 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 88

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Getting past them was the ultimate task I programmed Tron to carry out. He takes up Tron's dark disk.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: I turbo-charged him to burn hot and burn fast. Who else could handle the operating code in this disk? He extends the disk to Rush.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: You.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Uhhh, I don't think so.

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: It could mean the difference between winning and losing.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Hey, I'll try. Rush holds off Krod, takes the disk.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: What do I do - ? Waves of Rush's DATA ENERGY surge into disk circuitry.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yow! He buckles and shakes. Hands zapping. Knees trembling.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Steady. It's all about giving as much as you get. Let it become a part of you. Rush clenches teeth, concentrates. Grips the disk. Energy surges back and forth, up Rush's arms, around the disk. He holds tight, ready to scream -

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Awesome, dude! Don't let go! Fighters are amazed, as TRON'S DISK POWERS UP - And RUSH'S body circuits DAZZLE in the ruby circuitry pat of TRON. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 110 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 89

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Damn, look at that... He did it. Rush looks at his arms, astounded. His circuitry strobes hues of brilliant red. Disk animates and unfolds, reveali infinite surface variations. Rush feels new power surging inside his body. His eyes harden, keen like Tron's. Rush LEAPS BACKWARD, goes airbo lands on a ledge high above. Amazing balance.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: YES! Excellent move, dude!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: It feels... Awesome. Rush's voice is a little deeper, with a digital edge. It surprises him. He cocks his disk and THROWS. Disk rockets across the landscape, a mile away and STRIKE an X-NET SURVEY POST, blasting it to bits. Disk arcs high shoots back toward Rush. Rush looks worried for a second, ready to duck -

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Don't flinch, Rush! It's your disk now. Disk snaps back into Rush's hand, painlessly. Throbbing with energy.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Oh man, this is good. Rush pulls a new LIGHT WAND from a thigh bracket. It exte into a hundred-foot vaulting pole. Rush VAULTS across the canyon, lands with precision. Light pole retracts into th wand in a nanosecond.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Awwwww! Where can I get one of those? Another two vaults and a leap - Rush tosses his disk into spiral, steps off it mid-air (like stairs), and lands perfectly - rejoining the group. Cheers from Krod, Quantz, Boole and Code Monkeys. Flynn shakes Rush's hand - energy surges between them. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: It's for real, Quantz.

dialogues.speaker: QUANTZ
dialogues.text: We've got a chance to take down Plexor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor reviews a line of elite X-Takks. All are decked in thick battle gear, gripping an array of menacing ultra-te weapons.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Perfect. Any three of you could crash an army of Flynn's best. But I've prepare for his random acts by designing massive redundancy. Widen to reveal: BATTALION of X-Takks, lined in precise rows, filling the vast hall. Since Adolf Hitler, no one has displayed such awesome military machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mega sneaks in, alone. She pulls her disk off her back an raises it above her head. Data energizes around her. She clenches hard, trying to make the connection. A RUBY BEAM converges off her disk, reaching skyward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meg and Dewey work to dismantle the lab. Meg walks past, stops. Comes back. Reads fresh text ona computer screen: DOES MEG EXIST?

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Dewey. This your idea of a joke?

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Cybavor programming complete?

dialogues.speaker: X-NET SPECIALIST
dialogues.text: Yes. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 114 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 91

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Demonstrate. X-Net Specialists drops the sides on a cubic cage. A frozen dog-like CYBAVOR CREATURE stands like a statue. Plexor nods. X-Net Specialist activates. Cybavor comes alive. Circuits RAGING. Eyes pulsing. Plexor summons an X-Net Worker Drone.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Install yourself over there. Worker Drone does as he's told. He freezes in place.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Attack! Cybavor leaps like a hyena, bounds the length of the hall DIVES at the Worker Drone... And DEVOURS HIM mercilessly. Energy sparks fly, circuits zap, as the Cybavor digest th energy, GROWS LARGER, then SPLITS DOWN THE MIDDLE (like D then regrows the missing halves. Now the Cybavor is a PAIR of nasty, snarling Cybavors.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: End routine. Cybavors sit.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Elegant. Surveying his perfect defenses, he notices one thing miss

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Where is Mega?

dialogues.speaker: X-NET SECURITY LEADER
dialogues.text: Only you are authorized to monitor her coordinates.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Download forces. Await my command.

dialogues.speaker: X-NET SECURITY LEADER
dialogues.text: Download! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 114 115 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 92

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: X-Takks file out in perfect lines, turn perfect corners, dispersing into the compound. Each one moves in exactly t same way. Plexor turns sharply to exit, encountering... Mega. Stand there obediently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the fortress perimeter, X-Takks stand watch at the bas of a deep security moat. They turn, eyes scanning. Behind them, a LIGHT POLE exten into the canyon, then swings across. It's "tronified" Rush, using his vaulting pole to ferry Fighters across the moat edges. He returns to the far side, landing momentarily on a lone central pinnacle to make the distance. Rush vaults back to gather Krod, who's the last to cross.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Don't take this the wrong way.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Don't drop me. He hugs Krod and vaults them across. Krod clings and struggles, then YELPS - X-Takks hear and scan the pinnacle and moat edges. On top of the pinnacle, Rush and Krod hunker. Flynn signa from the far side "stay down!" X-Takks patrol below, pausing to gaze up. Atop the pinnacle, Krod's circuits energy-zap with fear. Rush holds him down. At last, X-Takks move on. Rush extends his light pole to the moat floor - vaults to the far side with Krod. Krod stabilizes, looks around.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Yeah, I recognize this place. I know where everything is! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 115 116 117 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 93

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He heads off, encounters a dead end. Quantz pulls him the right way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boole and Code Monk B3t help Flynn to a secluded data buf

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Rush, up there. See it? Rush leaps to a high circuitry nexus.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: I hope you're right about Mega. Rush touches circuitry, energizing it with data. Mega's image appears in circuitry energy patterns.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: You. Where is Flynn?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We're all here.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I arranged for your entry. An encryption portal has been left unlocked. Path 4786324BXY. Do you know the way? Rush looks down to Code Monk J2r. He gives a high sign.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mega watches glowing circuity image of Rush.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We got it.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Hurry. She deactivates. Rush's image vanishes. Mega thinks for a moment - we're not sure what - then wal around a corner. Bumps smack into: Plexor. Flanked by his two snarling Cybavors. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 117 118 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 94

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You contacted them.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: And?

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I gave them the portal address. They will attempt entry soon.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Perfect. We will be waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patrols of X-Takks pass. Rush leaps to a vantage point them. Scouts a route, signa Flynn, Krod, Boole, Quantz and the Code Monkeys. Fighter team scales a narrow ledge near the BLAZING FIREW It's like a sheet of molten lead, pouring endlessly befor them. A lethal barrier.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: This is all yours, Rush. Rush pulls his disk, holds it over his head and steps und the molten data flow. He struggles against raw power, dis HEATS UP WHITE, splashing aside the molten data.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Go! Quick! Code Monkeys, Flynn and Krod, Quantz and Boole dive betwe Rush's legs, emerging on the other side. Barrier overcome Rush leaps out of the firewall, clutching his white-hot d

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: No sweat. (to himself) OUCH.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK N1J
dialogues.text: That way to the portal!

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Let's do it. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 118 119 120 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 95

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They head for the fortress along a surreptitious route, avoiding X-Takk patrols.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor - with Mega and the Cybavors two paces behind - le an army of X-Takks. A Cybavor growls at Mega. She growls back.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: There it is. That's the portal. Plexor masses his forces around a closed ENCRYPTION PORTA It is a dark semispheric aperture, left unlocked (but clo

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Converge on all levels! Outside patrols close in behind these coordinates! X-Takks come from all directions, all levels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn pauses to see X-Net Patrols in motion, across bridg through tunnels. All around.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Something's up.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Keep moving. They come to a dark encryption portal, seen from their exterior view.

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: Portal 4786324BXY. This is it. Flynn withdraws the HOLOGON.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: The sooner Rush gets this into the Main power supply, the sooner X-Net shuts down. And the more of us come out of here to tell about it. Rush takes the hologon, stows it. Pumped looks between Code Monkeys, Boole and Quantz. Krod trembles. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 96

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Oh man, I think I'm leaking.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Krod. You'll do great.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Think so?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Your recognize patterns better than any of us. You'll know Plexor's moves before he does.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I hope you're right... Rush?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Yeah man?

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Are you really a "User"? Is there such a thing? Is that what makes you so good? All Programs hang on Rush's answer. Flynn too.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Flynn and I come from a realm no better or worse than here... One thing I know, neither place works unless you're looking out for the other guy. And we've got a word for what all of you are.

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: Obsolete?

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Heroes.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Cool.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK B3T
dialogues.text: I'm ready.

dialogues.speaker: QUANTZ
dialogues.text: Let's do it. Fighters hustle under the shadow of the portal... Approac the closed semispheric aperture.  124 122 123 124 125 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 97

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-Takks stand thick, weapons pointed at the closed apertu Plexor marks time. Cybavors poise to attack Mega, emotions rising, takes a step back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn falters on his wounded leg. Fighters steady him. Rush steps forward, places a hand on the semispheric aper Mechanism activates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor tenses, eager for the slaughter. X-Takks cock weapons, take careful aim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn, Code Monkeys, Quantz, Boole, Krod... Gathering nea Rush - PORTAL OPENS AROUND THEM, revealing a stunning view of: The inside of the fortress... Not an X-Takk in sight.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Nothing to it. Rush leads group inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plexor grows impatient. Senses trouble.

dialogues.speaker: OPEN IT
dialogues.text: X-Net Specialist activates portal. Semispheric aperture irises open to reveal: X-Takk Patrol. Charging in from outside. No fighters in sight. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 125 126 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 98

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Inside-X-Takks and outside-X-Takks take orders literally: They FIRE at EACH OTHER. Many crash, zap and fizzle. Cybavors leap in, devouring corrupted X-Takks. The two Cybavors use energy "food" to bifurcate into FOUR.

dialogues.speaker: CEASE FIRE
dialogues.text: They do so, instantly. Plexor fumes.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: You've been tricked! He spins to find Mega gone.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Mega has betrayed me for the last time! She is with the fighters! Find them! CRASH THEM ALL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mega RUNS from the scene. Around a corner, she collides with Rush, Flynn, Krod & Fighters. Breathless:

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Flynn! Keep moving! This way!

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: I'm proud of you, Mega.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I linked with MEG. Users exist. She instructed me.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Go, Meg! She glances over the new "tronified" Rush. Despite hersel she's impressed. But there's no time for talk.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Which way to the power supply?!

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: (scanning) Ummmm... That way! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 126 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 99

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Rush leaps to a high ledge to confirm: Massive throbbing power supply CORE CUBE lies at the center of the fortress concentric squares. High sign to Krod.

dialogues.speaker: TRON
dialogues.text: You're right! There it is!

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: And here they come! Rumble precedes: ARMY of X-Takks, coming to get them.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: Break out the toys! X-Takks are upon them, and the battle is joined. X-Net disks fly by the hundreds. Krod and Code Monkeys fire a SQRAM projectile, which open mid-air into a super-wide circular magnetic field "net". SQRAM field sucks in X-Net disk and zaps them to ash. X-Takks charge. Rush flips down from above, throws tron-disk - Disk ricochets of ten X-Takks, mows them down. Rush retrieves his disk, lands near Krod and Fighters.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Block this choke point, slow them down. Can you guys do it?

dialogues.speaker: QUANTZ
dialogues.text: Not a problem. He throws his disk behind his back, takes out an approach X-Net goon. Rush hurries away with Mega and Flynn. Krod, Quantz, Boole and Code Monkeys are besieged by a hu X-Takks.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Whoa! Retreat! That way! Keep firing! RUN! AHHH! Plexor enters the battle arena with his four CYBAVORS. He scans keenly, then heads off another direction.  127 128 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 100

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flynn hobbles, helped by Mega. Rush leads them around a corner, in sight of: MAIN POWER SUPPLY. Massive reactive CORE CONTAINMENT CUBE Rush comes to the edge of a deep, narrow moat. Bottom is channel of ROILING, MOLTEN CHROMATIC DATA. No bridges.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We have to get across.

dialogues.speaker: RAAAA
dialogues.text: Six X-Takks are upon them, disks flying, NegaByte eraser beams swinging. Flynn Takes a hit in the chest.

dialogues.speaker: ARRGGHH
dialogues.text: Rush and Mega dodge, fling their disks with lethal accura X-Takks crash and fall, tumbling into the moat abyss, fla as they hit the molten bottom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krod, Boole and Quantz bait a phalanx of X-Takks, Code Mo spring a DEGAUSSING CHARGE, which cuts off a column at th base. Column tumbles, crashing X-Takks, blocking the way. High fives among Krod and Fighters. One Small X-Takk breaks through, ZAPPING through the air, reforming, ZAPPING CLOSER. Fighters turn to blast him. But Krod recognizes the pattern:

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Wait! I know that dude! Quantz stuns an X-Takk Soldier - Code Monkeys hack his X- Armor. Armor powers down, revealing:

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I-beem! I-beem shakes off his brainwashing. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 101

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: Krod my friend! Who are these guys?!

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: We're taking out Plexor. You with us or them? X-Takks attack the group, including I-beem. I-beem zaps away, reappearing next to an X-Takk. He steal the X-Takk's NEGABYTE BLASTER and mows down three X-Takks saving trapped Boole.

dialogues.speaker: I-BEEM
dialogues.text: With you! I-beem joins Fighters as they press deeper, engaging the next X-Takk onslaught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Mega haul Flynn along a narrow ledge.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: There. You can make it across! He points to a thin ledge on the other side, far below. Rush extends his Light Pole to the ledge, moves to gather Flynn for a vault-crossing.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: No, take Mega! I'll stay here and run interference.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: You haven't got a chance by yourself.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Ah, these guys are wimps It's bravado: They know his odds are dismal. Flynn slumps into an alcove, which is only big enough for him. He pull a supply of SPIKED MINI-DISKS, ready to defend himself.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: We're not leaving you.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: My body is weak, but my will is strong. I promise, no matter what they do to me, I'll survive this. Trust the bigger plan. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 129 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 102

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He's fading fast.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: But Flynn - X-Takks attack along the ledge.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: GO! Now! Rush throws his arm around Mega and VAULTS across the moa landing on the far side - gaining a slim foot-hold below core ENTRY POINT. Flynn chooses his moment, leans out and throws. His mini disks take out X-Takks on the ledge. Their bodies tumble into the moat, flashing as they hit. Flynn spins, the wall behind him opens. At the end of a square corridor stands: PLEXOR. Flanked by his four snarling Cybavor beasts.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Flynn. Your moment of obsolescence is upon you. Across the moat, Rush and Mega climb to the entry point. Flynn plays for time, stalling Plexor so he doesn't catch sight of them.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Freedom, Plexor. It's the better idea. That's why Mega chose my side.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: If an idea is erased from all memory banks, it can be neither good nor bad. When each alternative has been removed, X-Net will simply BE. With a hand signal, he commands his Cybavors. They raise up, poised to attack Flynn.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Crash me. Hack me. Do what you want. The yearning for freedom will last forever.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Nice speech... USER! He flicks a finger. Cybavors gallop at Flynn.  130 131 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 103

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Mega gain footing at the entry point. They turn the sound of DIGITAL SNARLING. Across the moat, a gut-wrenching sight: All four Cybavors pounce on Flynn, hurling him off the le mauling him as they go down, dividing into eight - Plumme toward the MOLTEN DATA far below. Plexor steps out of his corridor, relishing the view: Rem of fallen bodies FLASH into the inferno.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Noooooo!!! Plexor sees Mega and Rush on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Over there! Surround them! Bridges instantly extend from outer square to CORE CUBE. X-Takks stream across, firing -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Mega duck inside entry point, pelted by disks. Before them: A vast, brilliant, energized LATTICE. Power surges in rings, drawing down huge columns. Every piece o geometry is based on perfect squares, made of mirror-fini rare earth elements. Rush pulls the HOLOGON KEY into view. Facets resonate wit energy patterns like those in the core.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We plug this into the control cell, X-Net is history.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Let's do it for Flynn. They share a heartbeat of solidarity. Rivalry gone. X-Takks stream in, firing. Rush and Mega charge the center, throwing disks, fighting back-to-back. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 131 132 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 104

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Problem is, ENERGY RINGS move continuously down the colum and the columns are spaced close - leaving just enough ti between ring-passes to jump through.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Now! He and Mega JUMP, nearly raked by down-flowing ENERGY RIN X-Takks fire NEGABYTE BLASTERS - but many of the beams ar caught in the energy flow and sucked away. That's how int this place is. X-Takk Soldier is grazed, stumbles into ENERGY COLUMN. RI rakes down and ZAPS him nasty - reducing him to bits, suc his energy to the levels below. Rush and Mega encounter oncoming X-Takks - they must spli up. They fling disks, taking out X-Takks, dodging fire - working their way deeper Meg and Rush throw their disks simultaneously. Both disks score hits, then arc to return. Rush and Mega catch each other's disk. They each look at the strange disks - it's just not the same. The do a quic swap and keep fighting.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Over there! The CONTROL CELL. Dead center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush and Mega battle off three X-Takks - the way is clear Rush leaps, crashes planes of silicon. Stows his disk, pu out the HOLOGON. Spots the control cell's key receptacle - SHAPES MATCH. Rush moves to insert the hologon. A DISK STRIKES his arm - HOLOGON flies wild.

dialogues.speaker: AAARRGGGHHH
dialogues.text: PLEXOR drops from above, riding an OPTIK SHAFT.

dialogues.speaker: PLEXOR
dialogues.text: Where did you get that?! No one knows this code but me! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 132 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 105

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Your software has the biggest flaw there is, Plexor. You can't see you own mistakes. Plexor snatches his Death-disk, corners Rush for the kill Mega's disk crashes silicon, comes at Plexor - But his defense field repels it. He slams it aside and it's raked away by downward flowing energy rings. Rush DIVES at PLEXOR. He's like a statue. But this time RUSH holds him and infuses tron-energy, breaking down Ple defense field, eating into his body circuits. It's fracta zapping fireworks - evenly matched foes battling face-to- face.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Do it Mega! Mega scoops HOLOGON off floor, makes for CONTROL CELL - Plexor's hand shoots out, GRABS HER, stops her like iron. Plexor exerts his power, holds Rush and Mega by the throa with his two hands, backing them toward a surface ripping with HOT ENERGY RINGS. Rush and Mega struggle, an inch from death -

dialogues.speaker: ZAAAAAA -
dialogues.text: Plexor stops, annoyed. Turns and sees: Krod, Fighters and I-beem have arrived, firing blasters a Plexor's SPINAL NEXUS. It hardly makes a dent, but it cre a fleeting opportunity for Rush - Rush ducks forward, SHOOTS his disk off his back, smackin Plexor in the throat. Mega falls clear - Rush hurls Plexor against energy rings - Energy rakes dow his body, but he fights the effects an DOES NOT MELT DOWN He step away, shakes off the damage, retrieves his disk i a hand. Mega snags the hologon -

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: She tosses it to Rush, who's already airborne - Rush catches hologon, sails to the control unit - (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 132 133 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 106

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Jams hologon into its receptacle. Plexor cocks his death disk, EYES FLASH ELECTRO-PSYCHOSIS Hologon REACTS with CENTRAL CELL - Shockwaves RADIATE - Energy rings go dim, then dark - Silicon shatters to ash - X-Takks power down. X-Net armor de-rezzes, leaving innoce civilian Programs. They shake off the mind-control and ri unshackled. And Plexor, like all things X-Net, chatters and glitches. His code erodes, his bits darken, the fiber of his being erodes from inside.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Now who's obsolete? Rush executes a final leap, extending his feet for the fi blow, straight at Plexor - CRASH - shattering him to bits Rush finally breathes. Sees I-beem, Krod, Quantz, Boole Code Monkeys.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Thanks guys.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: I'll never let you forget it. Boole tosses Rush his tron-disk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush, Mega, Krod, I-beem, Fighters and liberated Programs stow disks and step to a high vantage point. Before them expands a vista of cyberspace. Power-down of X-Net radiates in all directions, leaving everything else intact. Beautiful, exotic old data networ instantly begin to regenerate into the open space.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: We're free. At last we're free.  134 135 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 107

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sinclair commands the podium:

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: In a world exposed to increasing data corruption, I hereby switch on the first global network offering 100% guaranteed data security. Flawless performance, zero downtime. The world works hard, the world deserves... He throws a switch. HUGE monitors blaze with X-Net logos and graphic portals. Countdown 3,2,1...

dialogues.speaker: CROWD CHEERS. MEDIA BUZZES...
dialogues.text: X-Net instantly CRASHES. All screens jam, glitch and DIE. Crowd is stunned. Sinclair is mortified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krod, I-beem, Boole, Quantz and Code Monkeys CHEER. Mega embraces Rush. Energy sizzles between them.

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: I underestimated you. Thanks. She presses her lips to his. It's electric.

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: (to I-beem) You knew she always liked him.

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK B3T
dialogues.text: Is she pinging his EPROM?

dialogues.speaker: CODE MONK J2R
dialogues.text: I can't see from here. But out of triumph, a sudden concern - Rush's body shoots DATA ENERGY into Mega, into ground circuits... Lightshow overload intensifies and spreads. Mega backs away in pain. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 135 136 137 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 108

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Whoa, ouch, what? Ahhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: MEGA
dialogues.text: Rush, what is it? Rush's body DRAINS AWAY into the energized circuitry.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Guys! Mega! NOOO! He reaches a hand to Mega. PAIN ENERGY ZAPS her, but she clasps his hand anyway...

dialogues.speaker: KROD
dialogues.text: Help him! Code Monkeys attempt desperate measures, but soon it's ov Bits of Rush dissipate into surrounding circuitry, then B SKYWARD in blazing curtain, like a quantum aurora boreali Mega is left with a handful of nothing.

dialogues.speaker: QUANTZ
dialogues.text: It's the way it should be.

dialogues.speaker: BOOLE
dialogues.text: He's going back to the place he belongs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush's energy body hurls across cyberspace. Bits streak, light bends -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rush materializes in the target chair. Human flesh, real clothes. Same as the moment he left. He bolts up, realizes where he is. Looks at his hands. Sees Jo-jo the rat staring at him. Meg and Dewey hurry over to unstrap Rush. Meg holds his hands, checks the integrity of his body.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Rush. You made it! (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 137 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 109

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Like a bad cold, I'm always coming back.

dialogues.speaker: VOICES
dialogues.text: He made it! Rush! You okay?! Rush looks around. Miles ("Krod") and a group of oddly- familiar Co-WORKERS. People who look just like I-beem, Quantz, Boole and the Code Monkeys.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: (double-takes on Meg) I met a program you wrote. She's just as incredibly beautiful and confusing as you.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: I know. Mega told me all about what you did in there.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: She gave you my coordinates. That's how you uploaded me?

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Yes. Your coordinates... and his. They look across the room. At the control console stands a MAN with his back to us. He's curiously examining Meg's equipment.

dialogues.speaker: THE GUY
dialogues.text: She's done an amazing job here, Rush. He turns. It's FLYNN. In the flesh. Leg healed.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Flynn!

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: I told you to trust the bigger plan.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: I'd come to suspect Flynn was alive, inside. But I had no way to know for sure.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: You picked the right guy to send in. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 137 TRON 2.0 Jefferies 110

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Working down here, I became convinced someone tried to murder Flynn. But the only person I could confide in was the guy I suspected most. Elevator opens. Sinclair charges in, furious. Trailed by SECURITY MEN.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: What are you people doing down here!?! Get back to work! X-Net has CRASHED! We'll all be ruined!

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Speak for yourself, Sinclair. Sinclair wheels to see Flynn: Alive, standing in front of him. Trapped by the ugly truth, Sinclair turns rage on Me

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: I ordered you to destroy this equipment ! Rush gets in Sinclair's face.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Hey, jerk, she doesn't do your dirty work. Neither do I. Not anymore. You lied to me, to all of us. You want to deal with somebody? I'm the guy who crashed X-Net Sinclair goes for Rush. Rush delivers a solid punch. Sinclair grabs his bloody nose.

dialogues.speaker: SINCLAIR
dialogues.text: You're fired, everybody get out

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: No, Sinclair. I'm back. And I'm the boss again. You're fired. Not only are you fired, you're going to have a lot of explaining to do to the SEC, the Justice Department and the FBI. (to SECURITY MEN) Hold him until the police get here.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY MAN 1
dialogues.text: Yes Sir, Mr. Flynn. SECURITY MEN haul out Sinclair (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRON 2.0 Jefferies 141

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Flynn addresses the group.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: X-Net is dead. But Encom lives. We're going to bring this company back to its place as the leader in finding the next big thing. I'll need to be free to do the dreaming. So, effective immediately, I'm appointing two bold, bright, courageous people to head worldwide operations. He presents Rush and Meg. They're stunned.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: You both earned it.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: Cool.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: I love it.

dialogues.speaker: RUSH
dialogues.text: We'll take it. (to Miles - "Krod") You get a division to run.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Yes. (to Phlegman) Does that mean a bigger cubicle? Cheers all around. Flynn approaches Rush and Meg.

dialogues.speaker: FLYNN
dialogues.text: Put on some coffee. You two are going to be putting in a lot of overtime together. Meg turns to Rush.

dialogues.speaker: MEG
dialogues.text: Do you remember how, along time ago, you used to give me a professional congratulatory peck on the cheek? Rush goes for the lips.
